content: 'This item is exactly as described.'bI find many of the other reviews, specifically, the ones about the lack of brightness to be unfair. Lamp cover comes wrapped in plastic to keep it from getting dirty or ruined in packaging.'Perfect size to put on a desk and super convenient!'Comes with 3 USB ports that can charge just about anything, as well as 2 AC outlets!'The USB port on the lamp functions regardless of whether the lamp is on or off.'bOverall, can't complain, a great & sleek modern design, thats perfect for any table/bedroom/office.I would also like to mention that there is a 24-month warranty on the product!, as well as 90-Day money back guarantee if you are dissatisfied with the purchase!'

content: 'One of my biggest issues is the wiring mess I had behind my bed. Power squid among power squid, just a mess.'Until this came along. Now, one plug, feeds my alarm clock, feeds my Difuser, and both my phone and tablet!'bNow, you're probably wondering, why am I giving this thing such a raving review and only 4 stars?Well, the shade that comes with it, was a bit bent out of the box, and I had to bend it back into shape. That is literally the *only* complaint I have. Even the bulb that came with it is LED (3W @ 3200K temperature IIRC).'All in all, great lamp, very small, but very useful and functional.'

It is very easy to knock over. I have it tight in a corner to avoid this but before I didn't and just barely nudging my table almost made it fall over with ease. Which is why I give it 4 stars for this one reason.

content: '1. Assembly is easy and it takes less than 60 secs. You won t have to follow the included instructions.'2. Lamp doesn t come with bulb. Also, it has no shade. So, standard light bulb would be too bright for eyes. You will need use it with some fancy/vintage light bulb.'3. It is about 1.5 feet tall.'4. Plug in cord has on/off switch for the lamp. So, it makes little harder to turn it on/off. I wish they have put on/off switch on the lamp base or body.'5. It is a metal lamp and it looks very robust.'bI would rate this 4 stars if the switch wasn't so far from the lamp - its over 2 feet away. So if this is on a bedside table or side table by your couch - the switch will be near the floor at the back of the table.bTHe best case scenario would be to put a decorative Wifi Bulb in there and leave it on - But I shouldn't have to buy a 20 dollar lightbulb for a value oriented fixture.
title: 'Room for improvement - Switch on the cord is much to far from base.'

content: 'This is an eye catching lamp which is nicely priced and doubles as a conversation piece. I had no issue with any of the machined parts not fitting/screwing together properly and it was assembled in minutes. You don t really need the instructions to put this item together and this is a good thing since they are definitely lacking. I bought this Edison bulb (https://www.amazon.ca/gp/product/B07QC556HB/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o02_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1) and when combined with the lamp, gives a great industrial look. Like the other lamp I have from this company (https://www.amazon.ca/gp/product/B07ZYZG62H), my only complaint is that it is very bright, even with the 2300k/40w equivalent bulb. With no shade, you want to be careful where you place the lamp. An included dimmer on the cord would be nice in a future update so you can adjust the brightness and change the mood. Even with the brightness issue, I don t feel it is fair to take off a full star, so I am giving it a 5-star rating. In order to get more control over the brightness, I paired it with this dimmer switch (https://www.amazon.ca/gp/product/B07GFQ8PBV/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o00_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1) and am extremely pleased with the final result.'Recommended!'Good luck with your decision/purchase.'
title: 'Great looking lamp!'

content: 'Pros:'- Sharp, industrial aesthetic'- Solid build quality'- Easy to assemble'Cons:'- Looks nice, but honestly not very practical. Lack of a shade means this can really only be used with very dull edison lights'- A bit pricey for what it is'Summary:'bIt's hard to say that this is a bad lamp - it's honestly built very well, and looks good too. It's just a very specific aesthetic, and honestly is not a very practical table lamp. Because of the lack of a shade you can really only use this with dull edison bulbs, and to that end, this isn't practical for lighting any spaces really and is just for looks.bFor the current price of $50, I think you can do better than just a pretty lamp that isn't very practical. That said, if this is the very specific aesthetic you're looking for, this is well built and will get the job done for you.
title: 'Well-built, sharp looking lamp, but a little niche and not very practical'

content: 'TL;DR Summary:'Pros (+):'+Modern design'+Industrial theme'+Black'+Sleek'Cons (-):'-NONE'Read the full review for more.'================'This is a nice unique industrial style desk lamp that s sure to turn some heads. It s not a typical lamp with a lampshade in fact the bulb is front and center and inside a cage like design which gives a very unique look and also gives you a lot of light output. I found it subtle enough with the black colour that it can easily sit on your desk and not be intrusive, or you can have it in the bedroom as your main light source as well. I like the style and design!'======================='Rating Breakdown (5/5)'Product Quality: 5'Ease of use: 5'Performance: 5'Value: 5'Overall: 5'
title: 'Modern desk lamp'

content: 'Quick Review:'This fits really well in a rustic setting, but will also go well with a bunch of decors.'bIt's made of metal and seems well built and sturdy enough.Keep in mind that the bulb is always exposed so use of a white higher wattage bulb is a bit blinding. An Edison bulb is perfect for this lamp however it comes at the cost of useful lighting. (max 60 watt bulb)'bNote that the ON / Off switch is on the cord and is less than convenient. (deal breaker for me...I'm not interested in trying to reach / find the switch)bOverall it's an alright light but has a few drawbacks...you know going in that there's no shade which is going to affect lighting and the switch should be located on the lamp itself.bCost isn't really all that bad here...all my currant lamps cost more than this one.
title: 'Works Ok...On / Off Switch Is On The Cord...'

content: 'This is a beautiful industrial lamp that would be perfect for an office or even as a lamp on an end table. The matte black metal finish is very attractive and would look fantastic with an Edison style bulb. It is very eye catching in person and not only have I have received so many compliments, but I have also inspired a purchase!'It was very easy to assemble and insert a bulb (bulb not included). The light measures about 16 inches tall so it isn t obtrusive but it also holds its own on a table. The plug-in cord is 5.2 feet long and features an on/off toggle instead of an actual switch on the lamp. I only wish that it had a built in dimmer since it doesn t have a shade but I am currently experimenting with different bulbs so I can find the perfect level of brightness.'Overall, it is a very attractive lamp and would make a nice gift for someone who likes industrial type decor.'
title: 'Very Attractive'

content: 'This table lamp is simple, but really nice looking.'Super easy to assemble, it works well on my night table or on my living room side table. It is not overly bright, but will give you enough light if you want to read next to it.'The look is different and sleek. It really is nice anywhere in the house and fits modern and more classical decors.'The lamp is surprisingly light and I do like the location of the on/off button, which is on the electrical but towards the top, so no bending.'The only side thought....I tried both a white lightbulb and a dimmer, soft glow one and the dimmer soft glow looks way better and goes with the lamp more.'
title: 'Really looks nice'

content: ' Awesome color changing table lamp! The lamp can be adjusted to change the light intensity by sliding your finger across the touch sensor switch in the shape of a smiley face. A quick tap of the color button changes between the bright & warm white colors. A long press takes you into the color fading action of the rgb light spectrum. You can also select a few rgb colors without the fade. The light requires being plugged in and an adapter is included, so nothing else needs to be purchased.'The color changes inside the lamp are extremely consistent & evenly disbursed. I can not see any led light bulbs inside the unit. There is zero heat emitted from this light. Instructions are included right on the outside of the light to help understand how to use it. Of course the sticker can easily be removed & leaves no sticky residue. The smooth shape of the casing is very appealing & simple.'I have this lamp in my bedroom & use it during both day & night. It does a great job of adding color into my world where everything decor is gray, brown & white. I actually feel more cheerful after using the color changing mode. It is hard not to stare at it & be memorized. The warm & bright lamp colors are perfect for reading before bed.'
title: 'Nice colors, touch control, modern look'

content: ' My bedside lamp which I had been using for a long time broke down so I got it. It is really awesome. It looks modern and stylish. It is space shaver too. I liked it for many reasons. First of all, it is colorful light; you can set the light to change color itself or you can set your favorite color light manually. Secondly, it is dimmable. I can adjust the light very dim to use as a night lamp or bright enough for the entire bedroom. Especially its dim color light is very soothing for bed time. Similarly its touch control function is pretty amazing. No need to flip the switch anymore. I can simply touch and set the brightest, favourite color and so on. It has also got timer setting function; I can set 30m or 60m and it gets auto turn off. This bedside lamp is simply the best. I am in great love with this.'
title: 'Stylish, colorful touch control bedside lamp !'

content: ' Very good lamp. Get very bright and it s super modern in terms of functionality and technology. There s no buttons . It s really big. I wasn t expecting it to be this big but it s the size of my hand and a half maybe for height.'Tons of colors as you can see in the video I posted. It has different white lights and reading light.'Very light. Great packaging. Great price.'
title: 'Big. Colourful. Cool.'

content: 'b I love the all touch controls. The manufacturer promises a led lifetime of 25000h, this is perfectly complemented by the touch controls as mechanical switches is usually outlasted by the lifetime of the led beads. This is my light of choice when working on early morning as i can choose the warm amber light as opposed to pure white overhead lighting, and i can dim or brighten it as desired so in case i want to get back to sleep, not only i can turn on the timer but i can also leave it turned on on dim amber light so that my eyes won't be stressed out when i want to leave a light on
title: 'bYou'll love the all-touch control

content: 'bAs advertised. Correct dimensions, colours and lighting. I like what I see for the price quality-wise. I've attached a picture showing the lamp with a 14 watt compact fluorescent bulb in my room. It's a relaxed lighting look, and equivalent to a 60 watt incandescent bulb. I blew out the highlights in that picture but it gives an accurate look to the overall room lighting. That means the overall room lighting is accurate but the lamp itself is showing brighter than it is in reality in the room.bIt uses a standard bulb base so you can easily get 100 watt incandescent performance using a 23 watt CFL or ~15 watt LED standard size bulb (and remain under the 40 watt limit lamp rating). It's a rocker on/off switch on mine and if you look close in the picture you can see it poking just above the sectional profile. Definitely recommended if you like what you see.Cheers'

content: 'bI am pretty satisfied with the overall performance, size and the adjustable angles of this lamp. I like it it has a full array of lighting color / temp from white all the way back to tradition yellow. The flex tube to adjust the angle of your light is pretty sturdy, doesn't feel flimsy at all. Seems like this is going to last a long time. The Piano face panel and base is beautiful but you know....like all piano surface, even if you use a duster will leave scratch marks or marks on it....emm but that's the nature of the material. I dont' mind the shinny Piano surface at all. Simple functions, nothing fancy, it's all about the color temp light and brightness which is all I need when I work on my hobby stuff. If you need super bright and long range lighting, you need to buy expensive more heavy duty LED work lights / tubes that mount to your work bench. I am just using a long Ikea Desk with 2 of these lights and work for me. Different people have different needs, if you need bright lighting through out all areas of your hobby / work desk / bench, you will need to invest something more appropriate. But I don't think this will be disappointing for anyone that needs a ready light, more than enough. Anyway, it's a lamp, 360 lumen or something.... if it's bright enough for you, then you won't be disappointed. Beautiful touch panel for brightness adjustmen (like sweeping your finger on your Mac book to increase volume) Buttons responses is very accurate and no delays. Oh, it will remember your last light setting, so you don't have to re adjust every use.

content: 'bWhile searching for a new desk lamp for my office, this TaoTronics caught my eye because of it's sleek design and great reviews.I ordered the lamp along with several other items from Amazon and I was honestly shocked at how fast it was shipped. I had this lamp on my doorstep within 24 hours of purchasing it online! How awesome is that?'Upon first glance, I could tell that this product was going to be a good one. The box had a nice top carrying handle and upon opening, I found an instruction booklet and a card offering a free extended warranty from 1 year to 18 months.'The TaoTronics lamp itself is the perfect size. It can be handled easily and adjusted to whatever height is comfortable for you. It is light to carry but sturdy enough to stay in place. I find that the dimmable touch feature is extremely precise and I quite enjoy being able to select my own level of brightness. The LED is bright and does not give off any unwanted glare or shadows. It is perfect for doing work on the computer, writing at the desk or drawing.'Honestly, I am very impressed with this purchase. I would definitely recommend this desk lamp to others and I am thinking about buying another one for my bedroom as well!'
title: 'I never thought I would be so impressed by a desk lamp!'

content: 'Actually really like the lamp. The base is a little large but really love the different types of shades of lights and how it s touch.'They also have a few years of warranty so let s see what happens when the light bulb dies...'

title: 'It was a satisfying shopping experience'

content: 'I have been using my old desk lamp for over 20 years. It still works, but it heats up way too fast and the plug is HUGE!'I have been wanting a light foldable lamp like this for a while. There are so many brands and so many variations out there that it has been very tough for me to make the decision. For me, the things that I was looking for were: height of lamp so it does not hit my large monitor, flexibility of adjustments (such as angling the light to hit off the wall), brightness and cost.'Now, in terms of height, I highly suggest you to look into the dimension of the lamps. Because some lamps are way shorter than they look in pictures. This lamp is on the taller end, which is perfect and goes over my monitor. This way, I can work on my papers in front of me while the lamp hovers over my monitor instead of beside it.'bThis must be one of the most flexible desk lamps I've seen that is not wire framed. It literally have some sort of adjustable option at each joint. At the base and the arm, you can turn the lamp 120 degrees left and right. For me, this is useful because I can turn the lamp when I work at my desk or turn it back when I read in bed. Just right above that joint, there is another joint that lets you bend the overall lamp arm forward or backwards. At the top, between the longer arm of the lamp and light arm, there is also a joint there that lets you fold the lamp in half when not used or higher when you need more light in the room. Now, my favourite joint is slightly above this where it lets you turn the light arm 180 degrees to the left or the right. I use this often depending on what I am working on. If I am working on notes in a notebook, I would turn the light to shine directly downwards. If I am on the computer, I like to turn the light towards the wall and have the light bounce back to prevent glare. Like I said, this lamp is super adjustable.bThe brightness options surprised me. My old lamp had one setting - on or off. This lamp has 5 shades of light settings (from bright white to yellow), and in each shade, there's 12 levels of brightness setting. I love this because I like white light for some activities while I prefer a warmer yellow tone when I read. This is just super versatile. Also, I had it on for hours and it was still cool to the touch! Super impressed.bCost wise, lamps have been on a wide range of pricing. I got this during a Lightning Deal, so it was a good deal for me. Even if it wasn't on a lightning deal, I think I would have still get this.I also want to mention that it is super lightweight. The plug is a medium sized plug. There is a USB port behind the lamp which you can plug a cable in to charge your phone on your desk. It does not have a wireless charger. My phone is not compatible, so that does not affect me.'Overall, it is a good quality product. I would recommend this.'
title: 'Easily adjustable desk lamp for all'

content: 'It is of good quality! The lamp produces a very pleasant light. I have the equivalent of a 60 Watt incandescent bulb in it and reading is very easy. The Chargers work very well! I would buy this again!'
title: 'This lamp is a great addition to your bedside table!'

content: 'bI quite like this lamp. First, because of the look - the linen outer is really nice and adds to the aesthetic of the room. I appreciate that the plugs (one 3 prong and 2 Usb) work even if the actual light isn't on. It comes with a nice warm LED bulb so it uses very little electricity. It works great as a night table lamp because of the warm light it produces. I also like the size. It's perfect for what I purchased it for.
title: 'Great little lamp'

content: 'bI use this lamp fairly often at the desk and I have to say it is quite nice to have. It offers many different lighting options from a bright led to a warm yellow light, all of which can be brightened or dimmed to your desire. So if your a little more sensitive to light you can adjust to however you need, also proven to not be negative towards vampires (so this may not be the lamp you're looking for).The arm and head of the lamp offer many adjustments. I find this gives it more versatility than a standard desk lamp. Especially while working at a computer you can twist the head away from you so can get rid of any light shining directly in your eyes. It also offers a USB port on the back of the lamp which can come in quite handy.'bAll in all I have no complaints with this lamp, only positives, other than it not being able to be used against the most dangerous blood sucking monsters in the night. I'd reduce it a star because of this, but I didn't really expect it do serve this purpose. I made my own ultraviolet light for that, I'd give that 5 stars.
title: 'Very adjustable lamp, very pleased.'

content: 'This desk lamp is a game changer. It has many features that will suit your lighting needs. I will surely recommend this product to my friends. As for the durability, it is sturdy and the product is not cheap. Nonetheless, I will reassess this product in 6 month time.'

Again, very small issue because in a dark room it still lights enough to see the buttons more and your phone.What I like.'bPairing the speaking easy as eating pie. And it's seriously impressive for only a 5W unit running essentially off a USB. The bass isn't huge obviously but it's a very high quality bass you can appreciate coming from just a freaking lamp! I assume it uses the lamps housing as a bass chamber, and that is a good thing.bThe white lights are perfectly warm and soothing to the eye, even on high 1' in front of it.The quality seems fantastic and very well built.'Design is nice enough to make me second guess the theme in the rest of my room.'The timer is a superb function on a beside lamp. Set it when ur tired and just go to sleep. content: '1. Assembly is easy and it takes less than 60 secs. You won t have to follow the included instructions.'2. Lamp doesn t come with bulb. Also, it has no shade. Its about 2 feet down the cord so the switch is almost always behind my side table, So, it makes little harder to turn it on/off. I wish they have put on/off switch on the lamp base or body.'5. It is a metal lamp and it looks very robust. The base is weighted enough to keep the lamp from being overly tippy/top heavy.'

content: 'This is a beautiful lamp. I m a big fan of both metal and industrial styles and this lamp ticks both those boxes for me, while still retaining a lot of elegance in the globe-like shape. It s easy to assemble and you can also move the rings to your own position if you prefer. I love that it casts shadows in the shape of the lamp.'Like others, I do feel the switch is too far down the cord, which is a bit annoying, as otherwise this lamp is great. My other small issue is I found it s quite bright since you can see the bulb. Since I m currently in the process of moving house, I had to use a regular bulb. I ll try it with an edison bulb and update soon.'I do really love the look though!'
title: 'Lovely look, a bit bright on the eyes.'

content: 'This is a great lamp that is eye catching, priced right, and a conversation piece as well. I put it together in minutes and had no issue with any of the machined parts not fitting/screwing together properly. The instructions are not great, but you don t really need them to put this item together, it is pretty straight forward. The only issue I had was keeping the bars that form the atom from rotating. While not in the instructions, I found small screws on the sides that you can hand tighten to lock the bars in place once you get the shape you want. Once I did this, the lamp looked great. I paired it with the following Edison bulb (https://www.amazon.ca/gp/product/B07QC556HB/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o02_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1) and I was very pleased with the overall industrial look of the lamp. In fact, I liked these lights so much, I put one in another vintage lamp from the same company (https://www.amazon.ca/gp/product/B07ZYZFMWB) and looks just as good. My only issue or complaint is that the lamp is very bright, even with the 2300k/40w equivalent bulb. Since there is no shade, you need to be mindful of its placement. In order to change the mood or brightness of the light, an included dimmer on the cord would be nice in a future update. Even with this omission, I don t feel it is fair to take off a full star, so I am giving it a 5-star rating. In order to get more control over the brightness, I decided to pair it with this dimmer switch (https://www.amazon.ca/gp/product/B07GFQ8PBV/ref=ppx_yo_dt_b_asin_title_o00_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1) and this combination makes it nearly perfect.'Recommended!'Good luck with your decision/purchase.'
title: 'Nice looking lamp'

content: 'Great little lamp! Has a very cool look and adds character! Love It!'
title: 'Love this lamp!!'

content: 'bWhat's not to like?I use this on my bedside table to light the room at night.'It has a warm glow -- will depend somewhat on the bulb, of course -- that fills the room without hurting the eyes.'

content: 'the Lamps are gorgeous. We bought 2 for our bedroom and love them so much! Customer service is impeccable. Would highly recommend these beautiful lamps to anyone looking for something classy! Would definitely purchase again for my daughter s room in the future.'
title: 'Beautiful and class lamps! Perfect for any room!'

content: 'First off, I LIKE this lamp. I like how it looks, and once I got an Edison-style bulb for it, I like using it as an accent piece. But as an actual, functional light it is not very useful. I will explain why in a minute.'bAssembly takes literally 60 seconds, and is so simple the included instructions are not required, so I'll skip over that.The lamp does not come with a bulb, and for the price I think one should be included, and a nice Edison style incandescent bulb, because if you use a standard incandescent or LED bulb, even a low wattage one, it will be too bright because there is no shade. That is what makes this not particularly great as a lamp per se.'bIt has a great sort of industrial or even steampunk aesthetic though, and so an Edison style bulb works perfectly! They are dim enough that you won't be blinded by the lack of a shade, and the style compliments the steampunk-y aesthetic, making it great as a conversation piece or decoration.I wish there were an on/off switch on the body or base of the lamp instead of being in line on the power cable. That just makes it difficult to turn on and off in place. Those are OK for standing lamps, but not so much for table lamps. I solved this problem by putting it on top of a book case.'Overall, when paired with an Edison bulb, I like this lamp. But it IS pricey, and it is only really good for its look, and not its practical use. If you are shooting for a specific aesthetic in a room and this matches, great! Go for it. But I feel there is better value elsewhere in every other case.'
title: 'Great as an accent piece, not so great as a functional lamp'

content: 'I love the look of this lamp!'bIt's a standard desk top height with a nicely weighted base to keep it stable. It comes in parts to screw together with the electrical cord threaded through them. Other reviewers said that it went together very easily, and generally I would agree, but I somehow didn't match the threads right when I first connected the body to the top and had a terrible time separating them again, because the whole thing spun rather than staying still. I did finally get them apart but it took several attempts, so be sure to get it perfectly lined up the first time!The colour is a mottled brown/black, very industrial looking. The atom-like top comes flat and you rotate each layer to the position you like and then tighten the screws that attach them together. A small bag with a couple of screws was also in the box but with no explanation of what they are for. Perhaps spares for the lamp top?'bThe base arrives exposed, with a thin foam cover that you peel and stick once you assemble the lamp. It's a little flimsy and not necessary other than for keeping dust out. It wouldn't protect the inside if it were poked or somehow damaged.bI use a 40 watt smoked lightbulb to complete the industrial look. I recommend an opaque lightbulb since the bulb is exposed and will bother your eyes if it's in your line of vision.A pair of these for $99 or $129 in a furniture store would be very reasonable for the quality. Highly recommend if it suits your design tastes!'
title: 'Very stylish, unusual design'

content: 'Quick Review:'bI like this globe table lamp...it's simple yet stylish.This fits really well in a rustic setting, but will also go well with a bunch of decors.'bIt's made of metal and seems well built and sturdy enough.Measures in at 9.4 inches in diameter, 18.8 inches in height, and accepts up to a 60 watt bulb.'Keep in mind that the bulb is always exposed with this style so use of a white higher wattage bulb is a bit blinding. An Edison bulb is perfect for this lamp however it comes at the cost of useful lighting.'bNote that the ON / Off switch is on the cord and is less than convenient. (deal breaker for me...I'm not interested in trying to reach / find the switch)bOverall it's an alright light but has a few drawbacks...you know going in that there's no shade which is going to affect lighting and the switch should be located on the lamp itself.bCost isn't really all that bad here...all my currant lamps cost more than this one.
title: 'Simple & Stylish...ON / Off Switch Is On Power Cord.'

content: 'bThis Globe Table Lamp has a metal spherical design that looks industrial, rustic and quite appealing. It's hefty too so they used a nice metal for it too. The cord is of average length and the power button is a conventional on/off clicker design. I can position the individual globe spheres any way I want and this is mostly done so that it accomplishes the spherical look but at the same time block the glare since this lamp is not equipped with a lampshade.bDue to the glare, I am limited where I put this in my home. It best works on nightstands for temporary illumination. I am also able to position it behind me on a stand as I work on the computer. This works well as I don't see the glare. The bonus of not having a lampshade is that the lamp is very bright illuminating my entire bedroom well. Overall, if you're looking for an unusually designed lamp that is bright and not too expensive, this one is an excellent choice.
title: 'Unusual, Attractive Design But Practical Only In Certain Places Due to Partial Glare'

content: 'I really love the industrial style look of this globe lamp and the shadows it casts on my walls when it s illuminated! There s some assembly required, mainly screwing the metal pole onto the base of the lamp and then into the globe. You then have to adjust the globe s rings to get the desired look and then tighten the three screws to secure them into position, it s very simple and took all of 5 minutes maybe.'As long as you like the bare-naked bulb look, you ll appreciate this lamp. A low wattage (40 watt) Edison style bulb with warm yellow/orange color gives off a soft, warm glow. It would look great in a study, library, den, hallway table, etc. I wouldn t really recommend it as a night table lamp due to the naked bulb but that s just a personal preference.'The lamp has a built-in on/off switch and you can stick Velcro or 3M adhesive tape to the bottom and affix it to the wall or table you place it on so you can easily flip it on or off.'
title: 'Industrial yet rustic looking - aesthetically pleasing with Edison or Vintage style bul

content: 'bOverall I'm disappointed, there are many references to a USB port and to charging, I get it, it is used to charge other devices - I wanted to be able to not have to plug it in (at the moment have a long extension cord running through my living room, it will be a lot more work and more expensive putting a power receptacle where I need to use this lamp). The brightness level is not much more than adequate for me to be able to reading a book when I'm lying on my couch, at its brightest setting (if I knew the only real difference between this one and the newer model was and additional 3W I would have purchased that one), it is versatile enough to put into the best position for the job. I like its looks, seems sturdy enough.
title: 'Functionally Just Okay'

content: 'I ve been looking for an LED lamp to use for reading in bed for a while. (This replaced a halogen goose neck desk lamp with an Ikea dimma. ) It s a nice looking lamp. The colour temperature adjustment is nice. I d say it definitely doesn t deliver the same hue as the halogen. But it s decent.'bBecause I'm using this as a bedside lamp, the touch sensitive button feature becomes more than a tad frustrating. Finding the right spot in the middle of the night to turn the lamp on is an exercise in random blind finger stabbing.If I could redesign it, I d make the base thicker and more compact. Of course I d also go with physical buttons.'I ended up 3D printing a cover plate for the base that blocks the colour temperature change touch button and helps find the ON/OFF button in the dark. It\'s on Thingiverse if you search the brand/model of the lamp.'

content: 'First of all, THANK YOU so much for the amazing product! Other than that, there are several superficial scratches on the base of the lamp that become visible to the human eye when light is shined on it directly (I\'m assuming that it got scratched during packaging or it\'s a manufacture imperfection). Nevertheless, the product is in a much better condition than I thought and it is almost impossible to tell whether it has been used or not without a close inspection using a flashlight. Last but not least, I\'m very glad that there were no greasy fingerprints or glue of any kind on the lamp when I unboxed it. :)'Again, thanks for packaging my product with thorough care and exceeding my expectations. ---10/10!!'

content: 'bThis is one amazing lamp. I know, I know it's just a lamp. It is pretty, but it is so incredibly adjustable to each of your personal requirements for the amount of lighting needed. Choosing from a very bright setting when needed for artwork or sewing, or a comfortable easy on your eyes for reading or a lower lighting for gaming or just visiting with friends is easy on the touch control panel. The lamp base is weighted and sturdy, the lamp arm is adjustable for various angles of use and the lamp head is adjustable 180degrees. The manual comes in six languages and is easy to understand.bI have not yet had the need to use the USB charging port so I can not answer any questions in that regard. I'm just so impressed with this lamp, even the packaging was secure - no rattling in the box before I opened it. I would absolutely recommend this lamp. Thank you TaoTronics, this isa well put together product.'

I'm planning to buy the floor lamp version for easel painting. There are 10 different settings from warm to cool light. A really remarkable lamp. Terrific design and it costs a fraction of the lights marketed specifically for artists.

Any kind of light you need for any project. You need to hold the last 'power' one for a few seconds to turn off the whole lamp. Maybe not for seniors... might not turn off :)The swivel of the light of the base is great for where on the desk/ workbench you need it, (didnt work on the headboard or livingroom table for mom).'For a multipurpose lamp, 5 stars, we kept it and love it. Mom gave it 2. hahaha'

I looked for a lamp with these two adjustments; other similar models may not have these adjustments. Also like the variable colour temperatures and brightness levels. Touch-sensitive controls are easy to use. The USB charging port is a nice touch - can never have too many of these.'
title: 'Great desk lamp'

content: 'I am a nail technician and use this at my desk, it gives me an extremely well lit area to work under. I really like how easy it is to clean and neatly folded up on my desk when not in use .My only complaint is that the touch sensor s are very sensitive , I have this light placed close to my elbow for optimum lighting , and I often have accidentally changed the setting. I solve this problem by putting a small towel over the controls .'
title: 'Very good light'

content: 'I have owned this lamp for about a month now and have really enjoyed using it so far.'bThe touch controls (there's no actual physical buttons) are really easy to use and there are plenty of different lighting options to choose from so you can set it to your ideal brightness and color temperature. The aluminum body looks really nice and feels sturdy.bMy only complaint is that there is no memory for the brightness setting. For the color temperature, when you turn it off, it will remember which setting you had it on the last time. This is not the case for the brightness. By default, when it turns on, it will always be on the medium brightness setting. This is not a deal breaker but it would've been nice to have it remember the previous brightness.
title: 'Great LED Desk Lamp'

content: 'I was expected this light could be an standing light for my living room but when I got the item I found out it too small to be a living room light. I put it on my night stand as a night light which was working very well. You can simply touch to turn on/ off. If you stay touching for a couple seconds the bright level can be adjusted. Easy to use and storage. Memory function can setup my favourite brightness which I don t need to adjust it every time when I turn on the light.'
title: 'Very good dimmable night stand light'

content: 'It has barely been 2 months since I received this lamp, and it has been used very little (around 2-5 minutes between room light going off and bedtime).'bWhen I recieved it, I learnt that it had only 1 setting - one touch and it would turn on 'bright' and go 'off' at next touch, which was not what i expected but was fine with because it served my purpose.bHowever, yesterday, before bedtime it automatically dimmed on its own, which was very strange. And when I touched it, it dimmed even more. I tried to turn it off, but it wouldn't. So now it's turned into a lamp with 2 settings, 'Dim' and 'Dimmer' and has to be unplugged from the wall to turn off. I'm not sure what happened, but it's quite disappointing considering the great reviews I read about this product.
title: 'bDidn't live up to expectations sadly

Being able to adjust the brightness was exactly what is needed for this type of work. I love that it has the adjustable angled feature as well as a swivel base. If I could afford a couple more I would buy them. . Oh, and having the USB charging port on the back is great too. Everything is at my finger tips. Great buy for anyone... no matter what your needs are.

content: 'bI found this product because I was looking for a regular lamp but when I saw this was also a speaker I was a bit amused and bought it without much faith in it. But I was pleasantly surprised! The speaker has great quality, the volume it can reach is amazing and the lamp itself is a really nice light. The only reason I'm giving it 4 instead of 5 stars is that if I disconnect the speaker from my phone's bluetooth so I can connect it to my laptop, I have to press and hold to turn on the speaker again. I wish the speaker's bluetooth would remain on after being disconnected so I can switch devices more easily. Other than that, great product!
title: 'A great purchase'

content: 'bI've had mine nearly a year now and this has been a fantastic little lamp. Good brightness settings, bluetooth works well, sleep timer is super handy and it's nice to bring around the house and use as a bluetooth speaker. I didn't realize the buttons were touch activated when I first got it so my only gripe would be that the 'buttons' are hard to see when its pitch black although you can brush your hand along the front, which will turn the 3 button LED's on for a moment.Overall I love this thing and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a bedside lamp'
title: 'Great lamp'

content: 'This is the best little lamp I have ever had! It not only is portable and so convenient to be arrived to another room or even outdoors or when traveling and is cordless as well. It is very compact, simple to use and is so well built, dependable and very multifunctional. The light stays on for hours and can be soft or bright or anywhere in between. It even has a soft array of colours that can be arranged with a single touch, a timer and can even play your favourite music with another touch. I have already purchased a second lamp for my daughter and will most likely purchase more for gifts. It would also be perfect in case of a power outage. It only needs to be recharged and the light will last for over half a day without the need for recharging!'
title: 'This is the best multifunctional little lamp I have ever had!'

content: 'bI just received this lamp and tried it out and found a ton of things I don't like about it.b1) The lamp really isn't that brightb2) The lamp won't connect via bluetooth to my Samsung Galaxy S9b3) There's no dedicated app to control the lamp.b4) The sound of the speaker when I was pressing the sleep mode isn't that loud and is very TinnyThis is likely a product I am going to either return or just put back in the box and give away online to someone'
title: 'Just received this lamp and I am extremely disappointed'

content: 'I was looking for a light as a backup for power outages and one that would be easy to read by. The reviews on this lamp were enough to convince me to purchase it and I m glad I did. It is well made, the light is bright enough to read by and the music/speaker quality from the lamp via my phone s Bluetooth is good. It has a small footprint and it around a foot in height. It has different white light settings, plus you can change it to different colours. It s rechargeable, which met one of my main criteria. The speaker sound is much better than I expected and the speaker was very easy to connect to my phone. I m definitely considering purchasing another.'
title: 'Exactly what I wanted'

content: 'bWorks well so far good build quality. I got 2 of these, 1 for my computer desk, 1 as a night stand lamp. I wish the power button was not so close to the other controls. When you are groping around trying to turn it on in the dark, you change settings inadvertently. If there was one big power button next to the stem it would be better (but that's what I get for using a desk lamp on a night stand). Also, it does not keep settings if it loses power. A bit annoying, I would have paid another few dollars for them to implement nonvolatile storage for the settings. Overall, I'm very happy with these lamps, those are just suggestions for improvement.
title: 'Nice lamp, good temperature control. I wish button layout was different.'

content: 'I use the lamps on my night tables by my bed. The cord could be a bit longer - I need to use an extension cord. Other than that they look pretty but they are too pricey for their look and the quality.'
title: 'If I saw it in the store I would not pay that price.'

content: 'bI was a little skeptical initially but after getting this lamp I'm impressed. comparing this lamp to a regular lamp is like comparing a smartphone with a basic phone.Part one: light : there is one button for lighting, 6 modes, mode 1-4 is brightness from 1-4( warm light), mode 5 is orange, mode 6 is multi-color( keeps changing colors)'Part two:timer: you can set a timer for the light from 10 to 120 min. every time you choose a time, it speaks to you telling the time you choose.  yes the lamp speaks'part 3: bluetooth speaker: I have a google home mini and the sound quality is comparable to that which is impressive.'
title: 'This lamp makes you feel your in 21st century but warm and cozy at the same time.'

content: 'I was particularly drawn to the design of this lamp. It is unique and makes a great decorative lamp. Since it does not provide any shade, I would suggest that a warm light with a lower wattage is used. I have used a 40w edison bulb first and found it nice, but it was a little too bright. I currently have a Flicker Effect Light Bulb in it and it really makes the living room nice and cozy.'It was pretty easy to put together. I had it together in under 10 minutes. The quality is great. It has quality parts and when put together it is nice and sturdy. It is a little bigger than I expected it to be.'The only issue I find is that the switch is way too far down the cord and I would have loved for it to have a dimmer switch.'
title: 'Really nice decorate lamp. Good quality.'

content: 'bI've ordered a few lamps online and often times they are much smaller than expected but not this lamp. In fact I've ordered 4 from this seller in particular and all are exactly as shown and expected. This lamp is pretty unique looking. All but the inner circle are moveable. The on/off switch is located on the cord which makes this a great bedside table lamp. As with all lamps that don't have traditional shades, you might want to put a fancier bulb in it because everyone will see it. I've used an Edison type tube bulb that looks awesome in it.Overall quality is very good, I have no issues recommending this lamp or others in the collection, well made, stylish and safe electrical.'
title: 'Perfect size, great look'

title: 'Great depending on price.'

content: 'So, I was a night owl before, and found that I could really only be productive at night. Actually, this is false, and usually if you learn to regulate your sleep (look up sleep hygiene), then you can start waking up and sleeping like a normal person.'The problem was, the ceiling light I had was strong enough to not trigger the sleep chemicals in my brain. I never felt tired. I found by accident that having warm, dim light does, kind of like a sunset. I could have gotten a dimmer on the ceiling, but that is just a hassle to move back and forth. Also, the ceiling light casts a strange shadow while I write in my notebook, and this lamp effectively cancels that out.'bThe lamp is nice, it swivels and opens, and can tuck away which is super awesome. It has the same versatility as the lights at a dentist. Safe to say, the dim lights helps me get into that sleep zone, and stop the vicious cycle of insomnia. It's kind of like light therapy, except it doesn't emulate a sun rise... so it's like only half of a therapy.I havent used the USB feature, but it seems nice.'Pretty happy with this.'
title: 'Night Owl and Insomniacs need this'

content: 'Update - 17 Nov 2018'bAfter leaving the lamp unplugged for a few months, I tried it again just now and it's dead. It was not damaged or abused while unplugged; in fact, it just sat on the floor undisturbed. But it's completely dead now.bIt's a shame because it was a good lamp that I used extensively for a few months and now that I need it again, it's only good to be recycled.-------'bI like this lamp. It's simple but stylish and it throws a good clean light. I like the fact that it's dimmable so I'm able to adapt it to my lighting needs. The USB charging port at the back is nice to have but I don't use it much.The lamp folds to a nice compact storage-friendly size and on the whole, it remains cool to the touch even after several hours of use.'
title: 'Good lamp - works well'

content: 'I ordered it on Saturday and already received it Monday morning. The box and package was simple but well protected. The lamp is in good overall quality. Different from reviews that I read about this lamp did not remember the light intensity setting after being turn off. The manufacturer must have heard the feedback and updated it. My lamp now remember both the brightness and color temperature setting after being turn off. The brightness is adequate for desk lamp, and has a wide range of intensity to choose from. The 5 color temperature settings also make it suitable for various needs. The plastic+metal finish is nice. Operation is easy. The four rotating joints allow me to set the best lighting angles. The only thing that I found is the horizontal joint rotation the arm over the base is not as tight and snug as the other joints. So the base can move by itself when you pickup the lamp by the arm. But it is OK under normal cases when placed on a flat surface.'
title: 'Good overall quality. It now remembers the brightness and color temperature'

content: 'I really like this lite. I saw it at a friends house and fell in love . The Fact that there is so many different settings dim to bright also there s several different warm tones if you so choose to use . If I feel a migraine coming on I use the warm setting and my eyes instantly feel better. Is it the brightest task light on the market no . It s bright enough for and detailed task or reading you are doing . If you want it to light up a studio that s not gonna happen. For this price and the fact that you can plug your phone in . The light swivels and hangs low without falling over it s really cool .'
title: 'Best task light on the market with most options for this price . Very good value.'

content: 'Its a nice lamp, but had to return it because its not smart friendly, i.e the memory function is reset when you try to turn on the lamp after it is switched off, basically you set the memory to the brightness you want, and if u press the power button on and off the previous setting is retained, however if u try to operate the light with a smart plug the light is reset and powered off, I messaged the team and the rep said he will send this feature to the engineers.'

content: 'I purchased this lamp because my office does not have any windows, and therefore no natural light. Getting tired of working in yellow fluorescent light all day, I purchased this lamp in hopes that it would help with my productivity and overall mood during my work day. I\'ve had the lamp for about a month now, and I can honestly say it has helped! There is a natural light setting on the lamp that helps brighten the space where I sit in my office. The lamp is also very esthetically pleasing and high quality. Very happy with my purchase!'

content: '5-stars for brightness. The light at maximum brightness is very bright and we have to actually turn the brightness down a little bit. So, yes, it is very bright.'5-stars for ease of use. The brightness level can be changed. The color of the light can be changed from white to warm white, so that it is easy on the eyes. It remembers the last setting, so you get the same setting as last time when you turn it on again. So, that is very convenient. The neck is not a goose neck, so there is limited neck movement, but it can be flipped up/down based on need. So, certain angle changes are allowed. Lightweight, so it is easy to carry around wherever needed. The best part is that this lamp works in worldwide voltages from 100 to 240 volt.'

The second is that I wish it had raised buttons instead of touch-screen only because I use it as bedside lamps and it s hard to turn them on in the dark. You kind of keep tapping until you hit the right spot.'Other than that, the light part that is adjustable does not droop and sturdily stays in the position you set it to. content: 'I am highly impressed with TaoTronics TT-DL064 Portable LED Desk Lamp it looks very modern and attractive. The lamp is well designed, lightweight and sturdy. Highly recommended.'

The item would be pretty well perfect except for that.
title: 'Exactly as advertised'

content: 'bLove the look of this vintage table lamp. If this is the look you're going for, this is a good choice as it is well made and looks great. I would consider this one more of a mood light rather than a task or reading lamp. We have several light fixtures from this company and are very pleased with them.
title: 'Definite fan of this Industrial/Vintage line. Well made.'

content: 'bI like the looks of this lamp... but the photos show a complete product, and that's not what's in the box.bThe box does not include a bulb (but the title talks about an Edison E26), and the switch is further down the cord than it should be. Other than those points, it's a nice fixture!
title: 'Decent lamp'

content: 'Great look - vintage and sophisticated lamp. Made only from metal, very heavy and solid. When the light is on the metal plates around the bulb makes the shadows on the wall look pretty nefty. Not my first time using lamps from this company, good quality only.'
title: 'Sturdy'

content: 'bReally nice quality. I love how it gives you 5 shades of light, and it remembers what shade you last used and powers on to it. It's the perfect brightness for reading. The lamp neck is easy to move into the right position. It made my desk look nicer : )
title: 'I Love it'

content: 'This is a great lamp! Very versatile....many different levels of brightness and different shades of light, from bright white to very warm white and shades in between. Touch controls for brightness are very handy and easy to use. Also adjustable angles....both the vertical base piece and the light bar swivel to almost any desired angle. The USB charger even works really well. Excellent warranty. Light weight makes it easy to move around as well. A++++ for this lamp.'
title: 'A Winner!'

content: 'bI've had this lamp for 6 weeks now. It is well-designed, sturdy, and aesthetically appealing. Light emitted is pleasant and functional but not meant to light up a large surface area. I've not used the USB feature so I can't comment on that. The only downside is the power button. In the last 2 weeks the power button has become quirky and unreliable. Sometimes the lamp will turn on right away. Other times, I must repeatedly press the power button to get the lamp to turn on. The same goes for turning it off. The lamp does not always turn off when I press the power button for 2 secs. On occasion, it does not turn off at all, and I must unplug the adapter. This is totally unacceptable, not to mention disappointing and worrisome. I've sent an e-mail to Sunvalleytek and to Taotronics but have yet to receive a reply. Consequently I must give this item a poor rating.
title: 'Nice lamp but the on/off power button has become quirky and unreliable.'

content: 'Completely satisfied with this lamp & the Sunvalleytec Co. who I have purchased from before. I feel it would be hard to find a desk lamp of this fine quality for the price of $37.99 (2018). Ordered another today for a gift, comes in a great compact suitcase type box. This light is cool and can be warm depending on your lighting preference. The variety of shades & brightness levels adds to the beauty and enjoyment of this Tao tronics product. Thomas Edison would have loved it !'
title: 'LET THERE BE FANTASTIC LIGHT !'

content: 'There\'s something about this lamp that seems so at home. I just love the look and warm glow it puts out from the included 2700k 4 watt LED bulb.'bThe lamp uses a USB cord (attached) for power and you can plug it into anything from your computer to a power bank to your smartphone charger. There is also a USB out for charging your devices, however, the output power it provides is dependent on the adapter/power source you've connected to.The light is turned on by touching the base. Touch and holding the base will adjust the brightness.'I am concerned with one of the caution points on the instruction sheet: Only works with our LED dimmable Flicker free Bulb. Taken at face value, it would seem that you won\'t be able to use your own LED bulbs with this lamp, which would considerably limit the long-term life of this lamp.'Overall, this is a wonderful lamp that looks nice and is simple to use. I do worry about needing specific bulbs, but I do expect the included bulb to last many thousands of hours.'
title: 'Warm, dimmable, beautiful light'

content: 'Pros:'-I love the ability to simply touch the base with my fingers and it opens slowly. It looks prettier than the average bulb.'-The USB port situated on the base is convenient. I can charge my phone while laying in bed.'-Perfect small size for a nightstand'-Smooth lighting for reading'Cons:'-The cord that comes with the lamp is too short'b-Does not display enough light, even at it's highest setting-The plastic surrounding the inside of the lamp is ugly'-Works with a wall light switch plug, but it resets the setting and you need to touch the base to make it starts. Very annoying.'Conclusion:'Do not buy this lamp as a main light in your room. This lamp is made more for reading or if you want a nice smooth atmosphere in bed for some fun under the sheet.'

content: 'TL;DR Summary:'Pros (+):'+Touch control'+Modern looking'+USB charging port'+Dimmable'+Includes bulCons (-):'-NONE'Read the full review for more.'================'This is really at the end of the day a very modern lamp, It does a good job of what lamps do lighting up the room with an included bulb but it also does other things which most lamps cannot do! It s touch controlled, so this alone makes it easy to use in the dark and makes it very modern, it has a dimmable feature that you can adjust without problem, and best of all it has a USB port which you can use to charge your phone. More lamps need these features! Everything works well and as expected and I m happy about this.'======================='Rating Breakdown (5/5)'Product Quality: 5'Ease of use: 5'Performance: 5'Value: 5'Overall: 5'
title: 'A modern lamp'

content: 'bThis is a great little lamp (Kohree Touch Control Bedside LED Table Lamp, USB Charging Port Fully Dimmable Modern Nightstand Lamp, Desk Lamp with Fabric Lamp Shade for Bedroom Living Room Office, 4W 2700K Led Bulb Included) which is perfect for an area you would like a small amount of light - it's perfect for a bedside table as it takes care of charging your phone (when you plug in a charger to the included USB port) as well as illumination. Love that the lamp is dimmable by touching it only.bThe only slight drawback to this otherwise very sturdy lamp is that it can take a couple of seconds to turn on - but that appears to have been a contemplated feature as the manufacturer's own description takes that into account. Not a biggie, though.bI'm impressed with how easy this is to use right out of the box - it's only minor assembly, and everything you need is included. This is a great little lamp!
title: 'Lovely Little Lamp'

content: 'This is a very classic lamp with modern elements. It does come with an LED light bulb which is nice and it s easy to put the lamp together (some minor assembly is required). The touch sensor is located in the metal base of the lamp and you can tap it to turn it on and then tap and hold to control the brightness level. The lamp shade is very neutral with a woven linen type look to it.'It can get pretty low so it s just a very dim glow for you to see your way out of bed to go to the bathroom at night without waking up a partner and it can get bright enough to read a book in bed. The lamp does remember the last brightness level it was set to so you can dim it all the way down to minimum then tap to turn it off - that way, if you wake up for a pee break you can just tap the lamp and the minimal glow shouldn t disturb anyone nor shock your senses to full wakefulness.'bIt also has a USB port that you can use to plug in your smart phone to charge it at night and I love that they've included this feature as I always charge my phone in bed at night!
title: 'Dimmable touch lamp'

At low setting its great on a table instead of a candle then tap 2 times and the light is bright enough to read a book or play some games. I have not changed the batteries yet as it doesn't seem to draw much power. Great purchase and thinking of buying more as gifts.

content: 'Delivery was fast and the packaging of the parcel was very sturdy. As for the product itself, this lamp is very eye friendly if you do lots of desk work. content: 'Placed the lamp on the side table and found it to be great for the home environment as it is fairly small. The colour, style, and texture of the exterior fabric shade go really well with the theme of my home. The lamp has a traditional metal string with a metal ball which you pull on to either turn on or off along with a turn switch which does the same thing. I like the fact that it has these two options as it reminds me of classic lamps. It includes two USB slots found on the side of the base, is very convenient as it allows me to charge both my phone and tablet at the same time. They look nice, though a bit smaller than I expected and the shade feels a bit flimsy. I mostly paid extra to get the USB ports on the lamps, and unfortunately they don't reliably work on either lamp. I've plugged multiple devices into both lamps and it's really hit or miss whether it actually charges them.bIf you're looking for lamps that have a nice and modern look, and aren't too worried about the things I mentioned, these could work for you.

content: 'This lamp is perfect for a small study table or even by the bedside. It looks modern and I like the mild colors. This lamp is rechargeable and portable, so it can be used anywhere or moved around on a table without a power cable to deal with. There are 3 brightness levels. The light is pleasing to the eye and illuminates the immediate area around the lamp. There is a collapsible arm that can move the light to any angle and height, although it makes a creaking sound by design with each movement. I like the unobtrusive touch switch. It is located in the middle of the base. There is no clear indicator of the power button but as long as you touch in the middle area it will turn on. It would have been nice if the there was a sliding touch switch to control brightness too.'
title: 'Sleek, portable and bright with built in storage.'

content: 'This Light is great for doing my cross stitching or working on weeding with my vinyl creations (Cricut).'The highest level really illuminates my work without making shadows.'The plastic is a harder plastic and a bit cheap looking, and the light creaks when you expand it from its closed position.'bFrom the closed position, it's like a night light and bright enough to see what's next to you, but not overbearing.The front has the power button, and you press it until you get the lighting you want (or turning off the light).'The pencil holder part can certainly hold pencils, scissors, etc.without getting in the way of the light.'Overall, a cute desk lamp - perfect for the home office or crafting area.'

content: 'First I want your to know that 4 C batteries are required, but are not included. They provide 15 hours of continuous light before needing replaced.'The Ivation 12 LED has three lighting choices & Off. If you use Manual Mode you can choose Moonlight Mode (Warm White) which emits a soft, golden glow equal to 30 lumen, or you can choose Daylight Mode (Cool White) which emits a bright, white light that equals 45 lumen.'The Motion Sensing Mode allows you to set the light to detect motion using the Cool White light.'bMotion is detected up to 13' away, at a range of 110 x 90 . The light will remain on for about 60 seconds. Motion detection has been working fine for us...even when there is some light in the room; however, we have the sensor pointed away from the light.The light has 12 LEDs, 6 are Warm White, 6 are Cool White.'bThe light has a hanging hook which is great for outdoor use or camping. The hook folds down, out of the way when it's not needed. My hubby gets up several times a night so we\'re using the Motion Sensing Mode. The lampshade is about 6 1/2 in diameter at its widest. The light is too large to sit on our windowsill, so we have it on a dresser.'Although, I can read for about 20 minutes using the Daylight Mode, I need to be fairly close to the light.'bIf your light doesn't seem to be functioning properly one of the possibilities could be that the batteries need to be replaced. Review sample provided.bThis is a nice portable, battery operated light. It can be set to for Cool White or Warm White Light or Motion Sensing Cool White. The hanging hook, which can be folded out of the way, is useful for camping, or carrying the light like a lantern, etc. It's not the best reading light, but I can read for about 20 minutes if I'm close to the light.
title: 'Battery operated LED light with metal hanging hook. Has 3 lighting choices, Warm White, Cool White,or Motion Sensing/Cool White'

content: 'Free product provided for evaluation and review.'bThis is a little white lamp, that looks like a lamp. The 'shade' however has a loop on it, so this item can be hung up like a lantern if you wish.-plastic construction'-12 LEDs total which can be turned from high (bright enough for reading) or Low as a night light'- takes C cell batteries, which are easy to change'-has a motion detector function'bThe motion detector function works well, which makes this a nice light for a hall. In the bedroom, I find that it comes on when I turn over, and it wakes me up, so I turn the lamp around before I go to bed and cover the motion detector with a scarf. I tried moving it up higher but it still came on. It might be better if it were pointed away from the bed, but in my small bedroom I didn't have any luck unless I turned it away from me and covered it up. Also, the cats were setting it off.In a hall though, it is perfect- it lightens the hall as we get up at night, and has kept us from turning our bedroom lights on waking anyone else who is sleeping in the room. It provides plenty of light for navigation, or to get an item from the hall shelves.'bIt is light weight, with the bulk of the weight coming from the batteries as much as anything else. When mine was in the bedroom, a cat knocked it over more than once and it hit the floor. It didn't break- being a supple, flexible plastic it took the fall fine. The batteries did get knocked out once, and they just had to be replaced, and the item was as good as new. They nearly knocked it to the floor a few other times, so I do recommend putting it someplace cats usually don't jump to, or move around on. They can EASILY knock this off with one swipe of a paw or when stretching out.
title: 'Very light weight, bright, can be hung up, durable materials, lights can be bright or dim, sensitive motion detector'

content: 'bThe first thing you notice when this lamp arrives is that the box is not as heavy as you expect. That is the result of Chloe's clever use of resin instead of lead to join all the glass pieces. Assembling the lamp is easy because of the sensible packaging that keeps each component near the others that attach to it. We used LED bulbs (3000 K) in the top and an LED night light bulb in the base. The combination makes the amazing colours jump out at you. This lamp was a Christmas gift for my wife and she loves it.
title: 'Vibrant colour, easy assembly, great lamp'

content: 'The first thing I noticed about this vintage style lamp is its cable, almost all of the lights I have purchased came with the black slim power cable, but not this one. Its power cable feels premium, protected by the fabric like material, I only see this kind of power cable in my expensive photography studio light.'It comes with the LED lightbulb, and it is dimmable. That makes it a good reading lamp with dimmable light. All my guests love this vintage style lamp when they see it and ask me where I have bought it.'
title: 'Dimmable light, stylish built, very high quality power cabel.'

content: 'This is a nice LED lantern that uses 4 of the larger C size batteries. With the batteries in, the lamp is a lot heavier as you would expect, otherwise it\'s fairly light since it is made mostly of plastic.'There are 4 modes: on with warm light (they call it moonlight), off, on with cool bluish light (they call it daylight), and motion activated with cool bluish light. Unfortunately there is no way to use the warm light with the motion detection.'The lantern has a nice metal loop at the top so you can hang it.'bI can see it used for emergencies or for everyday use, like near some stairs or in a bathroom with it set to use the motion detection. It also won't turn on if there's already enough light, and that will extend the battery life.This is a decent (but not exceptional) lantern but I like this one even better: 'Ivation 6-LED Battery Operated Motion Sensing Table Lamp - Multi Zone Light: Body Only, Shade Only, or Both Body & Shade - can Also Light Continuously'Overall 4 stars.'NOTE: I was sent a free product sample for review. I was not paid or told what to write.'
title: 'Good LED lantern with two light color options (warm & cool)'

content: 'This is a very nice lamp for reading in the dark or just to use as a night lamp. The lamp is powered by 4 C batteries and uses 12 LEDs to light itself up. The settings are:'Warm White (w/o motion detection)'Bright White (w/o motion detection)'Bright White (w/ motion detection)'Off'One of the gripes I have with this lamp is that it can be very sensitive at times. I had my fan on in my room once and it kept flickering on and off multiple times like the stuff that happens in horror movies. Since then I have had it facing away from the fan and the problem has went away.'Aside from that, I really like the light modes on the lamp, especially the warm mode which I use when I am studying or reading. Plus the switch is also really easy to operate and does its job well. Highly recommended!'Sample provided in return for a honest and unbiased review.'
title: 'Works great as a table or night lamp.'

content: 'This lamp stands about 9 1/2 in. or 24 cm high, not including the retractable loop on top for hanging.'It has six cool white LEDs and six warm white LEDs under the plastic shade.'It is very versatile. It can be turned to warm light, cool light, or set to auto. On auto, the sensor turns it on if it is dark and there is motion and keeps it on until there is no motion for about 60 seconds or until there is ambient illumination from another source.'It takes four C batteries in the base and I recommend getting good quality rechargeables. The battery compartment is especially well-designed, easy to open but secure.'I am using this lamp in my kitchen, where having a light & motion sensor and operating from batteries makes it the perfect nightlight.'Ivation provided a lamp for evaluation and review.'
title: 'Auto-on and battery-powered'

content: 'I wanted to wait a good long while before writing a review for this lamp, so that it would be as fair as possible to the product, but also for anyone who may be reading this.'bI also wanted to mention that I did look at many of these Tiffany style lamps on Amazon before deciding on this particular one. I really like the design of this lamp and the overall look of it in my room. I do think finding a lamp that's going to be most suited for you and your personal needs is one of the most important factors of all.bWhen I stumbled upon this particular lamp, I knew right away this was the one for me. I also noticed the amount of positive reviews it received from other people, and it's not difficult to see why. It really is stunning, and Amazon photos really don't do it any justice at all.bSome of the main features of the lamp that I really like include: the on/off switch located on the cord. Some people may not like this feature or may feel it's even odd, but I personally think it's a much better option than pull-chain switches which can sometimes be problematic. I also like the amount of light it gives off. My lamp sits on top of a large old wooden desk in a corner of a room that doesn't always get the best light at night, and this lamp is perfect for lighting it up. I also like how easy it is to keep the lamp clean. Some lamps are impossible to clean because of fabrics used on the shade, but with this lamp you really only need to give it a quick wipe and that's it. The lamp also has a nice amount of weight to it, so you don't have to worry about it being tippy or easily knocked over. One suggestion I will make to anyone considering buying this, or any other Tiffany style lamp, is that in the description it lists places where the lamp can be used. One of these suggestions is a kids room. Depending on the age of the child (children) I would advise using your own personal judgement and discretion on this one.bAs stated, there is very light assembly for this lamp when you get it, but it's so easy and straight forward. All you need to do is fit the harp sleeves into the harp bottom, put the shade on and screw in the finial on top. Simple! Other reviewers of this lamp have commented that it comes with a bulb, and I can confirm this to be true. It does include one light bulb.bI've had my lamp for 6 months now, and I'm still just as happy with it. I really don't have one negative thing to say about it. Even the price is decent for what it offers. I highly recommend this particular lamp to anyone who's considering purchasing it. You won't be disappointed.
title: 'bIt's been 6 months

content: 'I will be direct and forward and just say this to start -- You got to buy this!!!'Excellent, excellent lamp from IKEA.'bDon't let the fact that it's cover is made of rice-paper turn you away -- it is high quality and it is just a style necessary to produce the nice soft, textured color. This lamp is very well-made and very, very well-thought out in design. The parts all all precise and well-machined and looks it like it is going to last a long time. Even comes with a high-quality floor switch. Arrived from Amazon nicely packed into a neat, small box; and easy to install -- took me about less than 8 minutes to set this up.bContrary to the seller's answer in the Q&A section above, this lamp also DOES accept A19 sized light bulbs with plenty of room left on the buls sides, especially if your bulb is LED since that would get only warm and not hot to burn the cover . The bulb base (the part where you screw it into the socket is E26 size.I used my Philips Hue LED color bulb with A19 shape and E26 base in this lamp.'IT LOOKS AMAZING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!'Here, please check out my photograph of this lamp with the Hue LED bulb.'Best lamp I ever purchased. And for this high quality and excellent design at this very low price? Are you kidding me? You got to buy this right away!'Note that in the second photograph, this lamp is placed next to three other lamps for comparison, including two Philips lamp on the right. All four lamps are using Philips Hue Color LED A19-E26 bulbs.'I will give you a price breakdown for value comparison, starting from left to right in the second photo:'(1) This IKEA lamp -- $20'(2) Some desk lamp I bought from a boutique high-end lights shop -- about $130'(3) Philips Wellness Table Lamp -- $124.99'(4) Philips Wellner Table Lamp -- $124.99'Now, looking at that second photo, you tell me which lamp has the best value? This one of course!'Granted, the Philips Wellner and Wellness lamps both came with a Philips Hue _White_ bulb which costs about $40 each (so those two lamps actually costs only about $85 each. But still, the value-for-money winner is clearly this IKEA lamp.'I am so happy with this lamp!'Very, very highly recommended.'
title: 'Excellent, excellent lamp from IKEA'

content: 'bThe built-in lighting fixtures in my apartment are carefully positioned for minimum inutility, so I have a need for lamps to help light up several dark zones, including the entirety of my bedroom. This lamp is perfect for the job, as it nestles discretely in a corner, and emits a diffuse light to gently illuminate the room. As you'd expect, it being an Ikea product, assembly is required and there are more parts than really seem necessary. But assembly is nonetheless a breeze.bI have it paired with a Phillips Hue Colour light, and it works great. A white LED would've been fine, but you need to at least budget for some kind of LED light, because a regular light will get too hot and set the thing ablaze.
title: 'Great utilitarian value'

content: 'It s nice but not what I was looking for took about ten mins to assemble and it looks nice but not what I want would I order it again probably not however it serves it purpose and I think ilea over rated so it s ok but not as bright as I want probably my light bulbs I ordered hopefully came fast nice packaged every part no damage so it s ok great if your looking for just a lamp period affordable and no issues at all but what you pay for is what you get right so if you are looking for a bargain grab it'

content: 'bThese lamps are perfect to brighten up a small apartment and also to allow lots of light. I love bright light and did not want a shade that absorbed too much of my light. These don't do that, but they do soften the light.They have held up fairly well, although a snag has caused a minor tear in one - I just turn the tear to face the wall and keep living. They look nice and pleasant, generally. Incredibly easy to assemble.'I will say that when I purchased these lamps I got TWO for just over $20 and I now see that they retail for ONE for nearly $30. content: 'This lamp produces a pretty nice light, good for a bedroom or even a living room. But I have to admit that the closer you get to this lamp, the stranger it looks. The crystals (which appear to just be angular pieces of clear but reflective plastic) are held in place by a series of wires, so while it looks like a pretty nice lamp from across the room, when you look at it close up (like if it\'s on your bedside table) I find it looks kind of weird. Not necessarily bad, just strange and not quite what I expected it to look like up close. Other than that I think it\'s pretty good value for the money, though if you just need a lamp there are certainly cheaper options. I think you end up paying a bit more for this one for the fancy light pattern it gives off.'
