content: 'bPRODUCT VALUE VERDICT: I'd pay up to $49.99 CAD for this productOVERALL GRADE: 91 / 100'***************************************' PACKAGING 'What is Good:'(+) Absolutely incredible packaging! Very colourful and professionally crafted.'(+) Inside the box, there was nice styrofoam padding to keep the LED lamp in mint condition.'(+) Main package contents include the LED Lamp, Power Adapter, Social Media Card, and a very informative User Manual'(+) A microfibre cleaning cloth was also included.'What Needs Improvement:'(-) N/A - Great overall job with the packaging.' DESIGN 'What is Good:'(+) Elegant Design.'(+) Brushed aluminum coating'(+) Sturdy Circular Shaped Base bottom.'(+) Touch-Sensitive dimmer slider to control brightness (11 levels of brightness)'(+) A temperature button to control the warmth / colour modes (5 options)'(+) The neck of the lamp can swivel to turn a 90 degree range of motion.'(+) The headlamp can bend 135 degrees vertically and also turn 90 degrees left or right.'(+) Includes a USB-input port that allows you to charge USB capable devices.'What Needs Improvement:'(-) It would be better if there was a great range of motion all around. It would be great if there was a 360 degree range of motion for each of the areas as opposed to the 90 degree and 135 degree limitations.' FUNCTIONALITY 'What is Good:'(+) There is a noticeable difference in the nits produced at each of the 11 levels of brightness. The lowest setting is great when you need just a touch of illumination; and the highest setting is excellent when you really need to brighten up the space.'(+) The 5-colour temperature settings are also noticeable different from one another and their brightness can also be controlled by the touch-sensitive dimmer!'(+) The LED lamp is easy to turn on (simply tap on the POWER symbol on the touch-sensitive dimmer).'(+) To power it off, hold down on the POWER symbol for about 2 seconds and it will shut off.'What Needs Improvement:'(-) Would be great if they include some MIXED temperature settings that blend together two or more different colour temperatures.' EASE OF USE 'What is Good:'(+) Very easy to use. Excellent inclusion of the touch-sensitive dimmer.'What Needs Improvement:'(-) N/A - works very smoothly as advertised. The touch-sensitive dimmer makes it a breeze to operate.' FINAL THOUGHTS 'This is a very well built and sturdy LED lamp. The circular base provides a solid foundation and keeps the lamp upright at all times. TaoTronics has certainly put a lot of effort into quality assurance to make sure that the weight is properly distributed so that the lamp remains balanced at all times. There have been instances where I ve tested other LED lamps to find that they topple over because they are not weighted properly, so kudos to TaoTronics for getting this done right.'The illumination produced by this lamp and the variety of temperature options on this lamp are both solid winners. The radiances and illumination will not disappoint you. It offers everything that most people would hope for out of an LED desk lamp. The only thing I wish to be added is a bit more variety in the temperature settings; including some mixed modes that can blend two or more different hues of light together. Aside from that, this is an excellent LED desk lamp for your home or office space and I highly recommend it at a price of $50 or less.'*Note: Product was received at a fully or partially discounted rate in exchange for a fair and honest review.'**Feel free to contact me if you have any specific questions about this review or questions regarding the product.'
title: 'Fully Feature Packed! Amazing bedside or small-office lamp!'

content: 'bThe build quality of this lamp is just out of this planet. Gorgeous looking thing. The light controls are also very useful. Give you the ability to have yellow, white and bluish light. Basically you can get the full spectrum of light. Doesn't that get terribly hot.bHowever, it will probably be an overkill for most people. There are other lights, even from Tao Tronics that are not this expensive and does pretty much the same thing this light does. However, they don't have the USB port.bAlso, the lamp is huge. This is by no mean a portable lamp. and you will need some dedicated space for this lamp. That could also be an issue for some people. We actually needed a portable lamp, but my wife liked it so much that we are keeping this one- even though it's not really portable.So in conclusion, the Lamp is fantastic, but make sure you need this much lamp for your needs.'
title: 'the Iphone of Desk Lamps!!'

content: 'b This is a pretty nice lamp. Solid, with tight joints, and offers more flexible arm and head positioning than many similar LED lamps out there. It's also quite bright at its highest settings (although, the differences between individual brightness settings on the slider bar aren't always enough to seem significant).Yet, contrary to the description, this lamp does NOT have 5 colour settings. It only has 2: a warm yellow light, and a cool bluish light. It DOES have 6 different brightness levels for each colour, though. So, you get a total of 12 possibilities, plus the nightlight.'The 6 buttons on the base are for: 1) On/Off, 2) Warm Light (has 6 brightness settings), 3) Cool Light (has 6 brightness settings), 4) to program a default favourite light setting (easily done), 5) to set a 60-minute off timer, & 6) Night Light (1 brightness only). (video demonstrates buttons 1,2,3 and 6)'bThere might be some magical way to access 3 more color options on this lamp, but I couldn't figure it out. Yet, what's here is probably more than enough for most people. If my aging eyes didn't need something even slightly brighter than this in order to read at the end of the day, I probably would have kept this lamp. But, because it's $70 and also not quite what it says it is, it's going back.

content: 'bGreat product for the most part: constructed beautifully (the metal finish is gorgeous), adequate lighting, all lighting modes work as described and are helpful in specific scenarios. The nightlight is something I won't be using as it's an office lamp; however, I can see it being beneficial if one were to use it in their main bedroom. The USB port being 2A instead of 1A on most other lamps is a great bonus as well.bThe only reason why I gave this product a 4 instead of a 5 is because there is a noticeable high-pitched ringing when the lamp is set to one specific lighting mode and brightness. It's not overly bad, but noticeable enough that I have avoided using that specific setting and probably won't ever use it because of it. Nevertheless, I won't be returning it for this reason as there are numerous other lighting options that are more than adequate.
title: 'bWould probably buy another. Wish they would fix high pitched ringing on one setting; but it's not a huge deal.

content: '3 stars, let me tell you why.'bLight mode's are good, switching is easy, brightness is excellent. those things I like.Base could be smaller, even half size'arm and adjustment - there is a problem - arm is too heavy, wrong design by proportion.'if you like to move arm left or right ( swivel), you have to hold the base, if you like to move arm up and down, you have to hold the base again.'bAs for a lamp, this is huge fault ! if you don't need to do adjustments often, it is a great looking piecebStill, I will keep it, for that price value is there, nice lamp with good lighting, I don't need to adjust often
title: 'pros and cons'

content: 'bI had some issues with my first unit which was from an early batch but my second unit was perfect. I selected this lamp because of the sleek brush metal finish and the ability to switch between warm lighting and intensities. The ability to charge a device thru the builtin USB port is a huge plus and although I don't use the nightlight, it's a neat little feature to have.bI paid around $100 which may be a bit steep for quality aesthetics (yes, it's still the NICEST desk lamp you can buy - and that includes the Saicoo which I previously owned) but you also have something very solidly built and not a cheap plasticy toy. Fortunately the price has since dropped around $30 making it much more affordable. A definite recommend!

content: 'The lamp is perfect for my desk, as it fits right in between my two monitors. The height allows it to stand slightly behind the monitors with the light source coming out over my work area. It is stable when the light arm is open, and pleasing to the eye when closed. It performs well with the flexibility to have a light setting for most needs. The touch panel is easy to operate and well labeled for making a quick choice of the light setting without having to spend time adjusting every time. My only small quibble is that the touch pad design aesthetically could be only slightly better. It may be personal preference, but the red indicator lights do take away from the elegant design. Perhaps a change of colour would improve the look. But that is my only small criticism. Otherwise, I would recommend it to anyone looking for a very nice desk lamp that is flexible and a good value for the money.'
title: 'A Worthy Contender'

content: 'This is a really nice example of an led desk light. Nice even very bright light for reading and fine craft work etc. Also the ability to adjust colour temperature from bright white to soft amber is really useful. The variable intensity adjustment could be finer as, in my view, there are not enough steps between full bright and low. The low could be less bright. The range of the arm adjustments is adequate except there could be an up and down hinge where the light unit attaches to the top arm. The base is nice and heavy and will not tilt if the light is extended forwards.'bThe only disappointment is that it is a little stiff to adjust and one needs to hold the base when adjusting, especially to swivel. I expected it to adjust easily with a finger touch without having to hold the base with my other hand, and yet stay in position, like the anglepoise lamps from the 70's, but it is not so. The styling is good for an office but may not suite every situation in a home.The finish is satisfactory and the whole lamp is aluminium with an acrylic cover on the base, much better than the many cheaper plastic ones, it has a solid feel to it. The touch controls work but sometimes require an additional tap. The night light is very useful. It looses the memory/favourite setting when the power goes off. The USB charging port is excellent and charges quickly.Whilst not cheap at the price, for what it is, it is good value. Many reviews give the impression that this is an incredibly wonderful thing. Perhaps because of that I expected more.'
title: 'Better than the competition, nice even light, very bright if needed.'

content: 'bThis is an excellent desk lamp. Very easy to adjust the position and the rotating head is a great option not found on some other lamps. This is VERY bright at it's full brightness. There are three color modes and a couple options for each, ranging from very warm and orange to a very sharp cold blue. There are lots of settings in between so you should be able to find one that you really like. The touch buttons work well, although some icons are arbitrary and meaningless and they're not in the correct order. It's imperfect but totally acceptable. If I was going to be really critical, it would be nice to have a diffuse cover on the night light part, as the light it produces isn't as soft as I would like, and I don't really understand the point of it but it's fine and works nicely. I would love it if there was an option to adjust the brightness of the touch buttons. The stand is heavy enough to hold the lamp arm, and the brushed metal finish is very nice looking and feeling but I wish it was a bit darker to match the mat black everything on my desk.

content: 'bI purchased this lamp to use at school and it's been doing exactly what I need and more. Starting with the looks, it has a piano black finish that looks really sleek. However, it is prone to fingerprints. A microfiber cloth is included so you can keep it nice and shiny. The base is really solid and sturdy so you do not need to worry about the lamp toppling over. The lamp can swivel around so you can adjust it to any situation. My only gripe with the design is that I wish that the swivel was not as loose as it is. It would be nice to have some slight resistance when turning it.There are 4 different light levels on this lamp with individual brightness settings for each. They are as follows: Reading, Study, Relax and Sleep. The reading and study modes send out a very white light while the relax and sleeping modes send out a more yellow-ish light so it is easier on your eyes. I found these customization options to be very convenient. This lamp also comes with a 60 minute timer, which I found to be useful because I often fall asleep with the light on. Even after I left the lamp on for a considerable amount of time, the LEDs were only warm at most.'bThere is a 1A USB port on the right side of the lamp for charging your phone. While it is useful for charging older phones, a 2A USB port would be more appropriate with today's phones. This is something I'd like to see if there was ever a second revision produced.Overall, this is a really useful lamp and is a good buy because it is always on sale. I liked it enough that I have already suggested it to my friends.'
title: 'A lamp with many options'

content: 'UPDATE 2: The lamp stopped working about 2 months ago and I\'ve thrown it away. The company, TaoTronics, admitted it was probably defective in a public comment, then changed their tune and said the crackling and flickering are normal when using the USB port after I emailed them about the problem. The crackling sound was definitely a sign of faulty, defective electronics which could pose a fire hazard. I do not recommend these lamps at all if they are still making and selling them.'UPDATED. It\'s a very nice lamp, but has one big flaw: when an iPhone is connected to the built-in USB port, the light flickers and it makes a very soft crackling sound that makes it seem like there\'s an electrical problem with the lamp. The seller claims this is normal, which I found odd. I would not leave the house with something plugged in and charging on this lamp in case there is an electrical problem.'There are 5 different color settings for the light, from bright white to a soft golden light. It has 12 different levels of brightness which is nice. Design is clean and sleek with a handy USB port built into the base for charging a cellphone. Two negatives: the cord is a bit short, so unless the outlet is nearby you\'ll probably need an extension cord. The light swivels in different places, which offers lots of ways to position the lamp. But where the lamp arm part meets the elbow gets a lot of stress when bending it, especially if you move the lamp part it by the tip (which is how it appears to be designed to work). Because of the swivel connection there, I\'m worried it\'ll snap off one of these days when bending it to a different position.'
title: 'Nice lamp, but charging phone makes the light flicker with low crackling sound'

content: 'Taotronics does it again. This LED lamp allows you to control light intensity (5 levels) as well as color temperature (also 5 levels). You can choose the color temperature appropriate to what you are doing, e.g., warm for reading, cooler for detail work, like sewing. The controls are all right on the base where they are readily accessible. The power is from a wall wart power supply.'bLike all LED lamps, it's very efficient in use of electricity, and the diffuser over the LEDs distributes the light evenly. It's very compact and folds into a fairly flat profile. This makes it easy to toss into a suitcase when traveling, giving you a reasonably portable, high quality light source. It's a big improvement over what you find in most hotels. There's also a USB charger port, which saves carrying another charger.All in all, this is a really good multipurpose lamp at a very low price. Highly recommended.'

content: 'Disclaimer: I was provided a sample in exchange for an honest and thorough review.'Since I received the lamp, I have been nothing but impressed. The packaging is convenient, and done very stylishly, which sets you to expect a really good product inside. The lamp is quite self-assembled, and comes with a power cord and a cleaning cloth.'The swivel on the lamp is quite impressive, and can be done at the base as well as the hinge of the head. Once opened, all you need to do is connect the power cord and the lamp is ready to use.'It includes a wide range of lighting temperatures (5 modes actually), and each of them have their own dimmable levels. You can change the temperature and brightness to suit your needs and mood, which is quite useful. The lamp consumes only 12W power, which is quite efficient, and also includes a USB port that can be used to charge any kind of portable electronic devices.'I have been using this lamp in my living room and have used it under various light settings; and extremely pleased with its performance over the past few weeks. I would recommend considering this lamp if you are planning to buy one.'

content: 'The TaoTronics TT-DL13 is an excellent choice for a lamp to use on a desk, by a chair, or on a nightstand. The lamp position and the quality and quantity of light are all highly adjustable.'It is full-size, standing about 16 in. tall when the lower arm is vertical and the upper arm is horizontal. The lamp base and head both swivel and there are two hinges, so it can hover over a book, light the entire desk surface, or be aimed at a wall for ambient illumination. It is easy to adjust but then stays in place.'The 7 1/8 in. diameter base is weighted for stability and has a spongy pad underneath. The 1 amp USB charging port on is very convenient. The matte finish is smudge resistant, but a microfiber polishing cloth is included, along with nominal 5 ft. power cable with wall adapter.'The LEDs provide exactly the amount and quality of light needed for activities from watching television to reading or detail work. The touch panel is easy to use and allows control of both the quality and quantity of light through the interplay of both cool and warm white LEDs. There are five color modes and seven stages of brightness, controlled separately. A lens provides very even light dispersal.'TaoTronics provided a desk lamp for evaluation and review.'
title: 'Highly adjustable'

content: 'I am a bit disapointed by the quality of the sample that I revceived. Based on the good reviews I bought the lamp, but it is not what I was expecting. It makes me sad because I had high hopes.'The good:'-The look of the lamp is great.'-The price is low (but you get what you pay for.)'The bad:'-My biggest disapointment: The joint where the frame is connected to the base is shaky, loose and does not feel solid. I fear that it could break soon, which give a cheap feel to the lamp.'-The base of the light is so leightweight that it is almost imposible to adjust the light without putting your hand on the base.'-The light is much less bright than what I expected.'-The light temperature setting are not as warm as in the picture.'I was really looking forward to test this lamp, but now I may return it because the quality is not what I was expecting.'
title: 'Disapointed by the loose joint between lamp body and the base'

content: 'Slim, modern and functional. An awesome lamp for my niece to use while away at school. This LED lamp remains cool to the touch and throws off very little heat even on the brightest settings. The included wall plug powers the lamp and fits into any AC outlet. The light is adjustable from a warm yellow to a bright white. The controls are located at the base of the lamp for easy access. Great for desk or night stand.'

content: 'This is a really beautiful desk lamp. From the actual body/style of the lamp, to the different levels of light it produces, it truly delivers on quality and effective helps to stop eye strain.'bAt night, I've been having a lot more headaches due to looking at the computer for long hours at a time (I work from home as an online editor and writer). So, I was really starting to get frustrated. I have no problem seeing (so I don't think I need glasses), I was just straining my eyes due to the bright light white in my work area.bThanks to this lamp and its ability to easily control how bright the light is, I'm not having nearly as many headaches. Plus, it's so flexible that I can basically aim the light exactly where I need it, which is even more effective at reducing eye strain.I love that I can make the light softer at night and especially at the wee hours of the night when I need to get a lot done. This definitely helps to not just improve my sight, but also improve my productivity.'I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest, unbiased review. All opinions are 100% mine.'
title: 'bYou won't be disappointed in this desk lamp. Works really well.

content: 'Received item as depicted on Amazon web page. No or minimal heat generated from the LED lights.'Easy to set up. Lamp can move in a number of directions...from the base left and right....the lamp moves up and down along the pivot point of the arm attachment....also the lamp can rotate along the pivot point for more precise illumination.'
title: 'Good purchase'

content: 'I use this in my sewing room. Light is adjustable which is good because the required lighting sometimes depends on the material and colour I am sewing. Very happy with it. I have not tried the sleep mode'
title: 'Excellent purchase for a reasonable price'

content: 'By versatility, I mean in 3 important ways:'1. Physical - This thing can physically turn and adjust it s base and arm in nearly all directions or at least enough to get whatever setting is perfect for most any project. The base, the arm, and the arm light direction can all rotate it s incredible.'2. Light Brightness - Innovative touch-sensitive controls built into the base can choose from many brightness settings as easy as swiping a finger over the base.'**3. Light Color THE BEST FOR LAST at the tap of a finger on the bottom of the base, you can change between 5 (FIVE!) different types of white light. As someone who s sensitive to various light levels depending on mood/task, this was even more useful than I could ve imagined.'The Cherry on Top: Built in USB port that can charge all devices, including iPads.'Lastly, I ve found myself taking this lamp everywhere around the house. It s great for concentrated work, casual reading, and often just a nice spotlight. And since it s LED, I know this will last a LONG time. I couldn t recommend this any more.'
title: 'Most versatile, most amazing, lamp I ve ever purchased'

content: 'bVery nice product. I would have given 5 but I don't really like the fact that we need to press the off button for 2 seconds to shut it off.
title: 'Nice product but long to shut off'

content: 'bThis lamp is great if you are looking for a good reading lamp. It has different settings from the darker lighting that are better for your eyes when you are reading to the brighter light meant to illuminate the area. I was provided this lamp as a sample testing product and I was very happy with it. I use it at work and it is a very professional lamp and it doesn't create a heat light other lamps may do. It also has different brightness settings which make it easy to control the intensity of the light. The overall design of the lamp make it very ideal to brightening up the room in terms of design. It has a very nice silver finish with a great base. It may not be the most ideal lamp for dark color rooms as it may clash with the color of the room. The setting were very easy to use and learn for basic beginners; however, there is a manual if you wish to know more about the settings and what they are used for. The metal of the stand makes the product very sturdy and very hard to break. It can definitely handle the weight of the lamp no problem. It also has an adjustable top that allows you to change the focus of the light to certain areas on your desk without the need to move your lamp which is really nice!! I am very happy with this product and would recommend it to anyone who are looking for a nice silver lamp with adjustable settings.
title: 'Great Lamp!!'

content: 'bThe Best Lamp For Your Eyes: if your eyes seem more sanative to really bright lights then this will work great for you. I was given a sample of this lamp in trade for my honest opinion. This is the best lamp I've ever tried-truly I have eye problems and this lamp doesn't not give me any headaches either using it to read with or just watching tv. This lamp would also be great to use, which I have-with just about any kind of crafts. If you do a lot of reading it is super, you can adjust the lighting and the color to the type of paper that's used in either books or newspaper, for a non glare this is the best. The only thing I would change if I had the chance would be, to be able to turn the head of the lamp at a 360 degree angle so the light could shine on the ceiling and give off more of the light to a bigger area. But for a desk lamp this is an amazingly bright. I like the style sleek and doesn't take up a lot of room. I also like the bonus-usb plug- to be able to charge my phone at the base of this unit, this really comes in handy. It comes neatly folded in a box-would make an excellent gift. Thanks TaoTronics for making this product, they certainly listen to their customers for what they are looking for in a desk lamp.
title: 'bBest Desk Lamp I've Ever Used

content: 'bI've purchased this lamp twice now. The first time, after a couple of weeks, it simply stopped working (despite a full charge). Defects can happen, so I sent it back and purchased another one - I managed to miss that the base light, formerly a nice warm white, has been changed for an ugly, glaring blue. Not happy at all, but it's too much trouble to send back again. If they change it back to white, this is a nice little lamp; otherwise I would buy one of the cheaper versions without the base light since it's unpleasant and hard on the eyes as it is - no reason to spend extra for that feature anymore.
title: 'No longer a smart purchase.'

content: 'bOverall, I am very satisfied with this lamp. It feels nice to the touch and adjusts very well in terms of height and where I would like the light directed too. I think my favourite part about this lamp is how you can dim or brighten the light, as well as the 60 minute timer on the lamp. Perfect for when I want to just browse my phone in bed but don't feel like getting up when I'll be done in half an hour. I can fall asleep knowing my lamp will turn off in half an hour or so when I'm done. I gave it 4 stars however, because the base is a little bit wobbly, and the fingerprints are really obvious at the base of the lamp, however both are not huge problems. I wish I could give it 4.5 stars but there isn't that option!
title: 'Loving the 60 min timer!'

content: 'bMostly great reviews so I thought I'd be happy with it. It's better than my last lamp which used an incandescent bulb, but I wouldn't purchase again or recommend to a friend. See below.Pros:'b1) Great light emission that's cool and not hard on the eyes.2) Seven separate brightness settings is a nice option - from quite dim to vibrant light.'3) Sleek design takes up very little desk space and looks very impressive.'4) Adjustable long neck is very precise and firm - allowing you to angle the light just how you want it.'b5) Doesn't heat up at all like the incandescent bulb lamps often do.Cons:'1) The base has virtually no weight, therefore you have to hold it down with your hands whenever you adjust the long neck.'b2) It's very difficult to put your hands on the base of the lamp without accidentally hitting the 'touch pad' which dims/brightens the light. (I have to touch the base whenever adjusting the long neck, dusting the glossy base or moving the unit itself on my desk)3) While the seven brightness settings is handy, the seven separate areas to touch are crammed together and difficult to hit individually, especially if you have bigger hands like I do. Perhaps more expensive to manufacture, but a scroll dimmer (like on an Ipad screen) would be far superior.'b4) Personally, not big on the glossy base. Matte would've been much nicer looking and wouldn't show dust or fingerprints as much.
title: 'bMostly great reviews so I thought I'd be happy with it

content: 'bUpdate: As my previous review stated I have got one stopped working but the vendor contacted me and provided a replacement quickly. This time the lamp is working very well without any issue at all. I'm really impressed not only by the quality of the product but also the excellent customer service of this vendor. I would not hesitate to buy any product from TaoTronics if I need in the future.bUsed for about 2 weeks and it stopped working. But it's nice when it worked. Amazon return service is fantastic.
title: 'Fatastic customer service!'

content: 'bI spent a lot of time looking for the perfect desk lamp. I always find myself spending a lot of time at my desk when the sun goes down. With my desk in the corner of my room, little to no light is directed in that area. Having this lamp is perfect because it's tall enough (17 inch) to illuminate my whole desk and small enough to take up as little room as possible. The light settings are perfect for every situation. The gooseneck is as flexible and struby as it needs to be. My only gripe about the product is the base. The touch sensitive buttons work 95% of the time but it isn't comfortable to slide your finger accross the button pad. Overall, I'm happy with my purchase and the price of the product while there can be some inmprovements made.
title: 'Illuminate your desk, Eliminate the darkness'

content: 'bThere's two parts of this review. The lamp, and the seller. BOTH deserve 5 stars.bFirstly - the lamp is PERFECT. Solidly built, compact and bright! I wanted to use it for my - ok don't judge - my nails. When I put a clear coat on, I can't always see if I've covered the entire nail, so I wanted something bright that could show me if I'm missing a spot because then it wont dry patchy. I tend to use it on the highest setting. And it works AMAZING.bThis seller also deserves 5 stars. I placed an order on Friday. 24 hours later, on a SATURDAY, I had my order. I never even paid for expedited delivery or anything!!! And I've NEVER received an amazon order on a Saturday.You can NOT go wrong with this lamp.'

content: 'I have to agree with other reviewers that I would prefer a longer neck (please see photos). In terms of its built, materials and quality, it is a very well made lamp.'It has simple and intuitive controls, adjustable neck and LED panel, and adjustable colour temperature and brightness. Aesthetically, it is visually appealing and well designed.'Simply put, it is a practical, utilitarian lamp. I have used it now for about a week, several hours every day. It is easy on the eyes.'Overall, it is a very good purchase. The touch controls are very convenient and responsive and require just a light touch to activate. The fact that the intensity and colour warmth can be adjusted, combined with its price point, make it a 5-star product. Buy with confidence.'
title: 'Stylish and functional lamp by TaoTronics. Great buy!'

content: 'How is your productivity nowadays?'How do you feel after 8 hours a front of a computer?'Having Problem focusing while driving on your way home?'More than 30% of work environments are not up to workspace lighting requirements.'bI'm sharing all these questions, or concerns because I spend most of my day a front of the computer.bGetting additional light at your workspace I crucial to stay focused and finish all your tasks on time aka to keep your job 'As a person who wears hard contact lenses and sleeps only 4-6 hours each day, this lamp from TaoTronics is an excellent edition to my work desk.'I love that I can adjust the angle and the brightness, just one swipe.'Very elegant and simple design, which can fit into any office or home.'If you have kids and they need to do their homework, or student that needs to stay late, mostly all night, preparing for exam, this lamp is essential tool'Why I love this lamp:'b' Simple, elegant designb' Easy adjustable to any angleb' Does not overheatb' Brightness controls with only one fingerHighly recommend this product'Increase your productivity'
title: 'Increase Your Productivity by 15% or More'

content: 'LED lamps offer a big advantage over regular fluorescent light. here is my experience with it.'Pro:'- cool touch sensitive interface that allows you to adjust the light.'- enough settings to choose from'- a flexible arm that is easy to move around'- a minimalist design'- GREAT packaging'Cons:'bits actually a really good lamp, I really couldn't understand why i never had it before . im not trying to play it as the best lamp, but LED lamps are amazing, specially for people like me who read or work on their desk a lot (i.e a student)verdict:'a student or not, i recommend you get our self one of these. thank me later :)'this was an honest review based on a sample product provided by the seller for review purposes. no promises were made, and all statements are based on experience with the product.'
title: 'try it and you will see what i mean'

content: 'This TaoTronics lamp was provided to me as part of a review program. It has been stressed that I can write whatever I want about the product - pointing out flaws or dislikes.'bThat won't be happening.bThis is a perfect bed-side or small study lamp. First off, it has a very small footprint, so it won't use up much space on even the smallest bed-side table. Its gooseneck design allows you to position the lamp wherever you want. And - unlike some goosenecks I've used - this one actually *holds* its position. No drooping or sagging.The control is a touch-sensitive slider seamlessly integrated into the base. No loud clicks when you turn it on or off; no fumbling for a switch if you need to get up in the night. Simply tap the slider area and the lamp comes on. Depending on what level of light you desire, the slider (which is not a physical slider but simply a smooth line on the base that senses where your fingertip is) can adjust the light to seven different levels. You can take it from a bright level intensity for study or reading, through to a relaxing ambient light.'bThis is a terrific product for the money, easy on the eyes (in more ways than one), and highly energy efficient. Its LED light source will likely last longer than you will - so you've got better odds of winning the lottery than having to replace LEDs.This is my second TaoTronics lamp, and I am honestly impressed with the design, quality, and functionality. A definite keeper.'TaoTronics Dimmable Touch Eye-Care LED Desk Lamp (7W, Black, Flexible Gooseneck, 7-Level Dimmer, Slide Touch-Sensitive Control Panel, No Dark Area, No Ghosting, No Glaring) - TT-DL11 Luna'
title: 'Light up your life'

content: 'The touch sensitive controls initially sounded cool, but, honestly, they are inferior to physical switch and/or slider.'It is uncommon to find an appliance that is a genuine irritant just to turn on and off like this lamp is. I find myself avoiding its use as much as possible on what seems like a subconscious level. Just thinking about the controls on this stupid lamp irritates me to an irrational degree. This should not happen.'bWhat's even worse is that the adjustable brightness is:a) always reset whenever you turn the lamp off and on again, and'b) is set to medium brightness instead of maximum brightness by default.'bThese issues just wouldn't happen with a physical switch and slider.Other than the stupid controls, the lamp works fine.'
title: 'bIf I could go back in time, I'd win the lottery first, then I would buy a different lamp.

content: 'bThis is my second TaoTronic light. the first one being TaoTronics Elune TT-DL01 which i use as my desk lamp. This one is cheaper with less function. I use it as a bedside reading light in my daughter's room. it has 7 level of lighting, which is a good range ( i use mine at lighting lvl 4) and a simple touch design make its easy to use. the gooseneck design is good and flexible im able to get it to angles suitable for my use.

content: 'The goal of any desk lamp is to help you to become as productive as possible. However, looking for the perfect desk lamp is not an easy task. Many are designed purely with aesthetics in mind but lack soul and originality. But what if you could combine both into one package?'First Impressions: I found the modern and sleek design of the LED lamp to fit in most contemporary desk setups. The stand out feature of course is the large LED array that sits attached nimbly to the adjustable neck coated in a rubber skin. The construction of the lamp and base of the unit is made with a relatively cheap plastic that does not seem too durable. Unit feels well balanced within the standard range of movement but will become unstable in unfamiliar positions. Included is a standard AC power adapter that plugs into the rear of the unit.'Function: The unit has 6 settings to choose from: On, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, Full. In theory, using a lamp is pretty simple because it s either on or off. However, this design is a little peculiar in the usability and will require some training to get used to the functions. First, powering on the unit is a simple tap and the unit will fire up to the default 3 setting. If you tap the power button again, it will take you back to the 1 setting. By either gliding your finger across or simply tapping each setting along the way, the unit will adjust its brightness accordingly. The confusing part is when you try to turn off the unit because instinctively, I would press a button for an action to take place. But, tapping the power button will take to level 1 instead of the default 3. I know, I know it s confusing but the only way to turn off the device is to hold down the power button for 2 seconds and the unit will turn off.'On the brighter side, (no pun intended), the LED lamp arrays produce a vibrant and clear light source that does not strain the eye. It is rather brilliant so be careful when looking directly at it. The length of the power cord was a little too short in my opinion which limited my placement options, but I did find the adjustable neck to be useful in shooting the light toward the ceiling and creating an ambient light source that fills the room. As an LED it consumes 75% less power than traditional incandescent lights, it can save on your electricity too.'Conclusion: Alright, so is the LED lamp worth your hard earned money? For sure! Despite its quirky user interface and decent build quality, the product does deliver the performance, function and energy savings that you would expect at this price point. With some improvements, this product would receive a perfect score.'
title: 'LED bliss at the glide of a button!'

content: 'This is a great LED desk lamp. It provides a natural light to be kind to your eyes; especially if you work at a computer all day. It is a good light for your bedroom or use as a reading lamp (ipad, kindle, etc) as it will not disturb anyone. It has several setting for light intensity and is quite good; even in a darkened room. It is small (and light), adjustable and does not take up space nor does it generate tons of heat or glare. It would be good for home, office, cottage or trailer. The adapter is not USB charger but a pin plug. Well recommended if you wear glasses (reading or otherwise).'An idea to add to this product would be a USB charge port so you could also charge your device while using it. Maybe for next revision. The pricing may be a tad too high (Canadian) without the addition of a USB port in order to bring it in line with other similar day vision LED lights on the market.'The description here is slightly incorrect as it does not seem to contain a cleaning cloth - the manual lists the box contents and it was nowhere to be found BUT no matter use the same cloth that you clean your screen with (a soft cloth - no liquid) and be sure to unplug before cleaning.'Great light ... love the slide intensity .. could probably play with that function all day. This is now part of a shared office space - wish I had two!'
title: 'Excellent, small LED Desk Lamp.'

title: 'Amazing'

content: ' This is the future of desk lamps. Traditional desk lamps, which utilize lightbulbs that have to be replaced once in a while, are a thing of the past.'Physically, the TaoTronics LED Desk Lamp comes with a quite compact footprint. It is smaller than the usual lightbulb-desk lamp. The panel that contains the LEDs is quite small, and the base is small as well - I had expected the lamp to be much larger. The desk lamp features shiny black plastic construction all around - because of this, although the lamp has solid build construction, the base, which has touch controls for power and brightness control, can draw fingerprints really easily. Personally, I would have appreciated if TaoTronics used matte finish plastic all around. The only part that is not shiny black plastic is the gooseneck, which is made of soft-touch plastic. Speaking of which, the gooseneck works EXTREMELY well, and is very flexible. The gooseneck will bend to the most extreme angles, allowing you to shine the lamp at almost anything from its fixed position.'However, do not underestimate this lamp. Functionally, the array of LEDs that are in this thing can get REALLY dim, and they can also get REALLY bright. The brightness range on this desk lamp is phenomenal in my opinion. The different settings of brightness on this lamp can suit the darkest environments to the least dark environments. On top of that, the LEDs come with the eye-protection feature, which will prevent your eyesight from being worsened by the light from this lamp.'bOverall, the TaoTronics Desk Lamp is an amazing product, and it would be a perfect product if it weren't for the slightly annoying shiny black plastic construction.
title: 'Compact, Flexible, Powerful Desk Lamp'

content: 'You really cannot have enough light. Whether you are a business man working through the night, a student studying all night, or just a person looking for a lamp beside their bed, this a a great lamp to consider.'Unlike conventional lamps which you could find mostly anywhere which takes light bulbs, you do not need to go through the annoying process of changing light bulbs. Also, you can forget about the hot light bulbs that may pose threat to you at any given time. Thanks to the LEDs, this lamp does not get hot, it gets a little warm, but very slightly, only until the point you can touch the lamp. Also, since these are LEDs, you do not need to change the bulbs as I mentioned.'The design of this lamp is really outstanding. In my opinion, judging from the pictures, I was kind of skeptical of what the product was going to feel like. I anticipated a cheap plasticy product, considering the price. However, what I got was surprising. Although it was constructed out of plastic, it feels very nice, premium, and durable. I also appreciated little touches such as the rubber sleeve for the gooseneck part, the opaque cover for the light which lets you look directly at the light. Also, I absolutely dig the touch controls. The controls on this thing is really futuristic, all touch controls, very convenient and easy to use. The brightness can be adjusted through a easy sliding motion, and there are enough brightness levels to suit your different needs.'Overall, this is an amazing lamp for the price you are paying for. The product is surprisingly very nicely made, and it will fit any bedroom with no problem what so ever, and it will just give that modern touch to where ever you put this lamp. I highly recommend this lamp if you are looking for a great quality, modern, and convenient lamp.'
title: 'Very Nicely Designed LED Lamp With Touch Controls!!'

content: 'I received this lamp in return for an honest review. It came in a very neat, compact package, with a handle.'bThe problem I have with the energy saving light bulbs is that the colour is too cold and they are really hard on the eyes. That's why I have been putting off changing my light bulbs to LED. This lamp, thankfully, is one of the better ones. You can slide your finger on the bar at the base of the lamp to select one of the 7 settings. The maximum is really bright. I find the lower settings are better, and you should try not to look directly at the light.My only complaint is that the flexible gooseneck is too short. I tried to put this on the bedside table for reading, as a test, but no matter how I try to adjust it without pointing the light at myself, my head ends up above the light. The lack of height of the lamp also makes it difficult to use a higher intensity setting and point it at the ceiling to get a reflected ambient light.'bAs with all LED lights, you don't have to worry about its longevity. Overall I would give this lamp 4 stars.
title: 'Good LED light, just the neck is too short'

content: 'bI've had this lamp for nearly a month now and absolutely love it!!bI've worked in offices for many years and wish I had this lamp a very long time ago. I've gone through the entire line of desk lamps of nearly every description. I can honestly say that this lamp exceeds my expectations.First of all, the lamp arrived neatly and securely packaged. With that alone you are given the sense that this is a quality piece of equipment. I have not been disappointed.'The lamp is fully adjustable to a multitude of heights up to about 13-14 inches (34-35 cm give or take). Way too high for my liking but even at that height the light on your desk is plenty bright to eliminate eye strain in dark or dimly lit offices. The head of the lamp is fairly thin and hides the bulbs entirely. The lamp has a solid base as well. It is not easily tipped. Another very nice touch is that the lamp never shines in your eyes. There is no upward glare from the light at all so my eyes feel rested even after a longer session doing my desk work.'One of the top features for me is the seven levels of light brightness. Yes that is right seven levels!!! There is one for everyone\'s viewing preference. No buttons to push ... merely slide your finger across the setting ... and voila ... the light fades or brightens to that level. Hold the off spot for a couple of seconds and the light shuts off. I was experimenting with this function before I even had a chance to read the manual which accompanies the lamp. Exactly how a product should be in my opinion.'I would recommend this lamp to anyone who is looking for a quality desk lamp. It looks at home on an office desk or even a game centre in order to provide the amount of light you desire for work or play.'
title: 'Absolutely the Best Desk Lamp I Have Used ...'

content: 'blown away by this lamp. base plastic is a bit glossy and cheap looking but otherwise this thing is great. you can select from 5 light output temperature settings (guessing a range of 6000k to 4300k) and touch controls and dimmer work great. poseable, inexpensive... might buy a second.'very happy with this purchase.'

content: 'bI bought this light to help with lighting in the early morning when I'm studying before work. It's definitely a good light for studying, but keep in mind that it is a relatively small light so you have about the width of a text book that will receive maximum lighting so if you are trying to light up a whole table it may be worth your while to get the larger version of the light.bIts a wonderful cool-colored light (bit of a blue hue) that is easily controlled brightness-wise with the touch-buttons at the base. I have had no issues with it being too light and toppling over as some reviews have stated. The neck is a bit shorter than I imagined (maybe 16 or 18 inches long when stretched out) but easily mobile which comes in great benefit when you are trying to keep light directly out of your eyes. It has a range of brightness levels of which i predominantly use the highest brightness level. Overall, i find it very good for studying articles or one text book at a time (I'm a big nerd and usually have several books open), but took off a star as I wish it had the ability to light up a more broad area.
title: 'Great for studying!'

content: 'bLight weight and space saving, has about 5 adjustable settings for any workspace, I love the fact that you can either plug into you computer or in an outlet. I looked high and low for something like this for my desk in my craft room; great if I'm sewing, working on my computer or whatever projects I'm working on. I love the fact that it is LED so it doesn't ge hot while I'm at my desk.
title: 'Perfect desk lamp for all uses'

content: 'bI've been using this light for about a week now, and it's been great. The lighting certainly doesn't cover as much as my old lamp, but there's a very little problem I have with it. The range of the lighting is great, I noticed that the light doesn't hurt my eye. I can read for hours without fatigue in my eye.The little problem I had was the base is a little too light. A little push or a more narrow twist of the lamp would knock over the lamp. I would have expected a heavier base so that it would balance a bit better... So I placed a bottle of hand sanitizer on top of the base to add weight onto the lamp.'bIt's a great desk lamp, I'd recommend.
title: 'Small little lamp that packs a lot of lighting'

title: 'I really like the adjustable brightness'

content: 'bWhat I like about this desk lamp is that it's the first LED one I've personally seen with a fully flexible arm. It can be positioned pretty much any way you like. The flex on the arm feels firm, so once you've positioned it, that's the way it's staying. You could use this as a night stand light if you wanted and so positioned, or even to backlight behind your TV.The other big USP is the custom lights. You can have a warm reading light or a keep me awake style natural blue light. Select as you will, choose what\'s best for your eyes and for the task at hand. As I was thinking about this I\'m actually inclined to recommend this for model builders and precise painters etc, as you can achieve a lighting position and brightness designed for precision work.'bThe base is also the right weight to keep this in place on your desk, so a slight tap won't send it topping over.Pros:'* Custom light'* Custom positioning'* Well built for the task'* Sturdy build and the right weight'Cons:'* None'I was given a sample in exchange for an honest opinion'

content: 'This LED Desklamp is affordable, power efficient, and has a functional 7-level dimmer that minimizing glare while reading. It has a non-ghosting and non-flickering bulb, an intuitive touch siding controller, and a reflective, unidirectional, and vision-friendly LED lighting head. With each purchase, you get a full one-year worry free manufacturer s warranty. This unit provides 7 watts of pleasant light output that is easy on your eyes. The controls for the lamp are very nice. The far left of the strip is the on and off and the rest of the bar controls brightness. You can tap the bar at the level you want, or gently slide your finger up and down the bar to control the level. There are seven distinct brightness levels but the smoothness of the control makes it feel like a continuous gradation. The best thing about it is that when the lamp is turned off and back on, your brightness level isn t reset. The neck responds well and can be easily adjusted to direct the light in almost any position you desire and feels velvety to the touch. I am not sure what the neck is manufactured out of but it seems to be quite solid and elegant at the same time. We mostly use this lamp on our desk in our computer loft at home however my wife occasionally borrows it for the night stand in our bedroom so she can read a book on low setting which provides her plenty of light for reading yet low enough to allow me to fall asleep without bothersome bright light from an incandescent table light. We are extremely happy with this product.'
title: 'This unit provides 7 watts of pleasant light output that is easy on your eyes'

content: 'bLamp is good, the colours options are a nice touch and it's easy enough to control. I do have a few gripes:bWhile plugged in, there is a blue power LED that you cannot turn off. It turns red when you touch the lamp. Great, except it's very noticeable in a dark room. Right now I have a sock covering the whole thing, but it's annoying.No easy way to turn off the light from the lowest brightness setting. You have to tap the light twice going through the brighter outputs before cycling back to off. Can be a bit jarring on the eyes, and may disturb your bed partner.'Overall nice quality, but not the perfect bedside reading light I was hoping for.'
title: 'Great lamp, maybe not for bedroom'

content: 'bDon't waste your money.Two major flaws in the design:'1) The touch sensor is very finicky - it often does not recognize touch at all, and you have to very consciously touch, re-touch, and touch again to get the lamp to operate. Pretty frustrating when your laying in bed trying to get the light to turn off.'b2) At night, when the room is dark, the blue power LED lights up the whole room like a night light. The only way to turn it off? Unplug the cord. Very annoying. Can't enjoy sleep.
title: 'bStupid annoying design. Don't waste your money.

content: 'There are so many reviews in YouTube for this lamp already. It is a good lamp but I would not call it a Smart lamp as the brand claims it to be. It is a standard desk lamp with manual controls via tapping on the bottom. All claims on reviews are true about this lamp. I will just step on the things I have noticed.'1. Cord is short and for some reason, it is attached to the side of the lamp rather than directly at the back of the brand name.'2. Blue standby light is not as bright as some people claim it to be.'3. Dust somehow sticks to the white side of the lamp. Better get a good wipe and place it on the desk to avoid this.'4. Touch side of lamp is sensitive to touch. Even slightest touch activates it.'5. Would appreciate it if BT capabilities were built in.'Overall the lamp was nice. It creates a nice ambiance to the room.'
title: 'Good lamp'

content: 'bI've become a fan of this atmosphere lamp. Its simplistic design is eye catching yet subtle, not to mention the light is bright and can be customized.The build is high quality - definitely what I was expecting at this price point. A metal base that is touch sensitive and high quality hard plastic for the upper shell. Easily bright enough for a bedside lamp or to add ambience to a room. The entire metal base is one button, you can touch anywhere to change brightness or modes.'bThe colour changing mode requires a long press and then slowly cycles through the colours. It'd be very nice to add to a room but not as the sole light source. You can give it another touch when on the colour cycle to choose which colour you'd like it to stay on putting you in control. The only downside to this is that it does cycle pretty slowly, so if you miss the exact shade you're looking for you'll be waiting another 30 seconds or so for it to come around again.bOverall this would be great as a gift for a dorm, a teenager's room, or even as a desk lamp. I'm very pleased with the responsiveness of this lamp and the ability to customize which colour you'd like.This product was provided for review purposes, I have only promised my unbiased and honest opinion.'
title: 'Sturdy lamp, suitable for many different settings'

content: 'bThe lamp is awesome. The touch feature is a great feature and works really well. The brightness levels are really good. It has more of a warm white vs blue light, so it's better for night time.The downside to the lamp is there is an after glow. Rather, the small blue indicator light that lets you know that the lamp is plugged in, causes a blue glow after the light has been turned off. For me, I prefer to sleep in total darkness, so having a lamp that glowed, I felt my sleeping was disturbed. I actually returned the product since I found it harder to sleep.'
title: 'Great Lamp, but....'

content: ' Purchased 2, for bedside nightstands, and at full brightness they are bright enough to illuminate the entire room.'The color mode is a nice touch at well.'Tap and hold the touch area for 2 seconds (while the lamp is on or off) to switch on the alternating colors. The lamp can be stopped at a specific color by a single tap. Tap again to resume or hold for 2 seconds to exit the color mode.'

content: 'This is a really cool lamp. Short taps cycle through the expected off-low-medium-high light cycle. Holding your finger on the lamp for a couple of seconds allows you to enter the disco zone with slowly alternating colours. It\'s very cool. The only small niggle I have with this lamp and the reason I\'m not giving it five stars is that there is a blue LED that is illuminated when the lamp is off. I wanted to use this lamp in my bedroom, but in a dark room the LED has the effect of illuminating the entire lamp with a very faint blue light. It\'s enough that I am aware of it when I wake up at three in the morning. I want my bedroom to be pitch black and free of LEDs. So, I had to move this lamp to a different part of the house.'

content: 'High quality LED lamp with a sleek modern design and a lot of light modes with many colours available.'bThis Aukey Lamp has a really outstanding quality. It looks fairly simple, yet aesthetically modern design which pleases the eye. It is not too big in size, and would easily fit onto a night stand. Its really great to use at a bedside with its dimmable light and touch controls. The lamp doesn't take up much space, with the design opting for a taller build rather than a large lamp. The materials feel very high quality and while the lamp is still very fragile, it has a pretty durable construction.bThe lamp is very efficient, powered by a small DC cable with a small output. The inner LED has a very long life span and consumes a very small amount of power to work. There are multiple light modes available, from very bright to really low and in between. But the lamp's functionality moves beyond that point - with the touch button at the Aukey logo point, which I admit is a bit of a pain to use and switch in between modes. In the different light mode, the lamp works in switching between 5-6 colours, although there is no obvious way to dim the lamp in such mode of different colours. The lamp looks really nice when set to colours such as blue, yellow, or green. The glow is pretty nice and colours look really authentic.bWhile it was a bit annoying to attempt switching modes in this lamp, its even more annoying trying to modify the individual colour of the lamp - its supposed to feature 256 different colours for a great deal of customization for one's liking. But in fact, the touch-like interface is very clunky to use and you end up reverting back to the standard light modes more frequently than getting the desired results. This is really a single issue I have been able to find with this lamp, but nonetheless its quite annoying. The touch-like interface could have been modified, or better yet, this lamp really would benefit from an app connection. That way, the lamp colours can be easily controlled and it would be smooth to navigate colour options. This is something to consider for product improvement, as phone app controls can really benefit the product. The colours are really nice looking and when you do get to customize it to your liking, the lamp is exceptional.This Aukey LED lamp is a high quality product with a lot of different colours. Aside from the horrible light control, the lamp allows for a great deal of colours. This is a perfect addition to any night stand and the lamp looks really great, with taking up very little space also. Great quality product, would recommend.'
title: 'High quality LED lamp with a modern design and a large amount of customizeable colours'

content: 'I like this lamp but ended up not using it for the intended purchase. It just doesn t work for me as a bedside lamp because of the way the light is - it hurts my eyes and doesn t provide light in a way that is useful. I also am not crazy about the cheap looking top. Who wants to spend 10 minutes trying to get the light on and set to the color you want it?'bIf the product had controllable switches or knobs on the bottom I'd buy a couple more. It's current form... maybe I'll give as a gift so something to someone I want to frustrate.bUpdate: Ann from Aukey reached out. They seem to provide good service. As I said it's a good lamp. I just don't like the controls on it.Update 2: Apparently Ann from Aukey\'s contact with me was less motivated by making sure I was satisfied and more motivated by trying to get me to improve my 3 star rating Because 1-3 star is regarded as negative on Amaozn'As I said it is a great light with bad controls so the 3 star rating stands.'If you want a better rating improve the product.'Update... now Aukey is spamming me. I never asked for your bloody email. Downgrading my rating.'
title: 'bAs a light it's exactly what we wanted... but...

content: 'I own a lot of essential oil diffusers and humidifiers simply because I enjoy the warm ambiance of their colorful LED lighting, and I was intrigued to check out this LED bedside lamp, because it appeared to include many of the features I enjoy on my lights, only without the water reservoir of diffusers. I was incredibly impressed with the lamp I received.'bThis LED bedside lamp is a great medium-sized tabletop lamp which includes an adapter and a set of instructions. The instructions are simple and straightforward and the lamp doesn't require any assembly. It is 9 inches tall in size and weighs around 1.5 pounds. It has a color temperature of between 2900-3100K, so it gives off warm white light (not daylight spectrum), as well as a plethora of different colors of light. The LEDs are said to last around 35,000 hours and the lamp's exterior is mad from an attractive combination of ABS plastic and aluminum alloy.This light has no buttons, but rather it is turned on off and switched into different modes simply by touching the aluminum portion of the lamp. When powered on, the notification LED is blue, and then you can touch the lamp to turn it on. Initially, it will be on the dimmest of three brightness settings for the warm white lamp. If you press it a second time, the lamp will become brighter, and if you press it once more, it will become brighter yet. Pressing it once more will turn off the lamp.'If instead you press the lamp and hold your finger there for three seconds, the lamp will swap to a color changing mode that cycles between a beautiful array of bright colors. If you want to stop and hold on a particular color, you simply need to press the lamp once more and it will stop on the color of your choice. It will continue cycling if you press it again. This allows you to select, say, a pink or a light green, or any other color you so desire. I actually really appreciated this setting, because it allowed me to more closely match the LED lighting of this diffuser to some LED strip accent lighting I have nearby. I also want to point out that this LED lamp is significantly brighter than any of my essential oil diffuser lamps, which was a pleasant surprise!'bAnother pleasant surprise was that this lamp doesn't have any noises when you press it. There are no short beeping noises acknowledging when you press it, which I much prefer to my essential oil diffuser lamps. I currently use mine at work and really love it!This LED lamp quite easy to operate and functions completely as advertised. It works well, and is very bright, with an abundance of lighting options. Just keep in mind that you cannot control the brightness of it when it is in its color mode. I would definitely recommend it to anyone who is interested in a tabletop bedside LED lamp.'
title: 'Amazing LED Bedside Lamp !!!'

content: ' Great alternative to the standard light bulb lamps I have had for many years. This LED lamp has a much smaller footprint, looks great and functions much better than a standard lamp.'Positives:'- Very bright on the higher setting.'- Many different colors to cycle through which actually looks awesome.'- Small footprint, much smaller than a standard lamp. Also looks very elegant.'- Touch button which are easy to use in the dark (no fiddling for a switch or turny thingys).'- 3 Brightness settings to choose from.'- Feels like a premium product.'- Looks good beside my IMac (Both have that classic silver look)'Negatives:'b- Touch settings take a while to get used to, once you learn them however this won't matter.- No timer function which I would really like to see in a product like this.'Love this lamp and mostly use it beside my bed, I hate waking up at night and trying to find my lamp switch. With this lamp all you need to do is touch the bottom. If you are looking for a bedside lamp then I would highly suggest checking this one out, the color feature is also neat.'
title: 'Great looking bedside LED lamp.'

content: 'bThis is a really useful lamp. I have been particularly enjoying it over the holidays. It lets you change the colour and also the brightness. I really like having it set to red in the evening, it gives off a nice festive glow. To use the lamp, you simply touch the metallic base, and then touch it again until you reach the brightness you want. Then, long press the base and it will cycle through the colours. Tap it one time once it finds the colour you would like to use. The build quality on the lamp is great. It feels solid and heavy, and the finishes are really nice and of high quality. The base is metal and the top portion is plastic. With the LED bulb in this lamp it will probably last forever. My favourite feature is the colour selection. It really helps create a nice ambiance in the room you are using it in. The lamp doesn't give off a ton of light but it's more than enough for a small to medium sized room. Overall recommended!

content: 'bI got this lamp on sale for about 50% off and am quite pleased with it. I wouldn't pay full price for this item, but for about $20 it is definitely a great purchase! For those of you wondering how this lamp works, basically it has two modes - one mode is white, and the other mode is coloured. When in the white mode, you can cycle between 3 different brightness settings which is really useful. When in the coloured mode, the lamp will cycle through a range of colour (it has a fade transition between each colour which is really nice) and you can pause it to make it stay on a certain colour. I'm giving this product 4 stars instead of 5 for two reasons: 1) it would be really cool if the coloured mode also had 3 brightness levels, but it does not, and 2) there's no way to skip or speed up the transition speed when in coloured mode, so if you want to pause it on a specific colour, you have to wait for it to change to that colour which can take about 30-60 seconds depending on what colour you want (it always seems to transition in the same order, so if the colour you want is towards the end of the rotation, you would have to wait for it each time). Neither of these issues are problematic, they were just things that I noticed that I felt could have been included or improved. But aside from that, I'm really happy with this lamp and will definitely keep my eyes out for it going on sale again, I would love to get another one (or maybe more) for my house!
title: 'Really happy with this little lamp! Could use a couple minor improvements, but overall very satisfied!'

content: 'bFirst off it works as advertised. The coolest thing about this item is that it can be set to change colours. The quality of the make is excellent. However, its 8 inches tall which is short for a bedside table lamp. The light output isn't bright enough to actually use it to read a novel. I am not sure how other reviews say that the output of light is good enough to use as reading light. If you want to strain your eyes then go ahead, this one's the right one for you. But I for one would like to save my eyes.
title: 'The quality of the make is excellent. However'

content: 'I was super excited when this light arrived. I have been looking for something like this to put in my record player unit for ages and this was absolutely perfect. It has a great unobtrusive modern look to it and would fit in well in any kind of space at home or work. The lamp arrived super quickly and the packaging was great.'bIt also has the easiest controls you could ask for! I don't understand why other people are finding it difficult to operate this lamp, you literally just tap the base of the lamp and it switches instantly between all the different settings. By the sounds of it the people who have had difficulty with it have not read the enclosed instructions properly. And on that note the instructions are super clear and easy to read and I had the light setup and going in under a minute.bI love the different strengths of white light you can have on but most of the time either leave it on the colour rotation or have one colour on constantly. I can't recommend this product highly enough, it exceeded all my expectations. Aukey does it again!I paid a discounted price for this product in exchange for my honest review. No rewards or penalties are given for reviewing either positively or negatively so all opinions are unbiased and my own.'

content: 'bI received this lamp as a gift for Christmas in 2016 and I've enjoyed it ever since. The white light is brighter than expected, it's a warmer white and it is very easy on the eyes when using it late at night. I have to agree with other statements regarding the colour shifting issue. It isn't as smooth as I'd like it to be but I don't leave it in colour shifting mode usually. One issue I had with the lamp was the surprisingly bright blue LED indicator remained on even when the lamp was off. Being my bedside lamp, this blue light was affecting my sleep at night. I lived with it for a few months but it got to the point where I really didn't see the point in having a light indicate the device is off so I just removed the LED. The device works perfectly without it and now I don't have any more light in my room when I'm sleeping.
title: 'Excellent bedside lamp, aside from the blue LED indicator'

content: 'The Aukey LED atmosphere lamp is a very cool, stylish, and fun light. Operation is simple - by touching the silver strip that wraps around the base you can turn it on, switch colours/modes, and turn it off. There are three different brightness settings and many different colours to lock the light to. The auto cycle feature is fun for a party or with friends over.'Lamp set up is very easy. Just plug it in and start using it.'bThis lamp is about 21 cm tall and 10 cm in diameter. Since it's LED, it doesn't get hot at all like incandescent lamps do. The energy-efficient LED lights inside are designed to last 35,000 hours - plenty of time before burning out. Should be noted that this lamp is not designed to have LED lights replaced, so the lamp is all-enclosed single unit.::::: Pros :::::'- Dimming settings'- Many different colour settings'- Party mode cycles through 200+ different colour shades'- Easy touch panel control'- Affordable'- Stylish'- Rated for 35,000 hours'::::: Cons :::::'- Touch control does take getting used to'- No way to replace LED lights'::::: Verdict :::::'Overall, this lamp is a fun product and has function in addition to the mood lighting capabilities. Great to fill a lighting spot in any room in the home!'If you found my review helpful please click the --- YES --- button!'

content: 'The Aukey Touch Operated LED Lamp cam in a nice card board box. The box contained a lamp, a power adapter, 24 months warranty card and an instruction manual. The packaging has enough cushion to protect its content.'The Lamp itself looks a very simple ordinary lamp. When I opened the box I was not super excited by the over all look of the lamp. However when I plugged in and try to operate it, it really amazed me.'bIts very easy to use as It's an plug and play device. You can switch Lamp On or Off by touching its metal base.The beauty of this Lamp is its powerful LED lights and its powerful touch sensor. When you plug it in the power outlet the lamp will not switch it on unless you touch its control panel (the place it has sensor). The first time you touch it it will glow with mild dusky white light, if you touch it again then intensity of light will increases. If you long press for 3 seconds then its sensor would activate its 256-color auto-cycling mode that can bright up to 256 colors and gives you a nice lighting show experience.'bSince it has LEDs meaning that it's current consumption is way low compare to traditional lights. As per manufacturer's listing the LED lights has a life of 35000 hours.bIt's nice sleek design makes it perfect candidate to place it in any settings from yours living room to bedroom. It goes well almost anywhere and looks great in any settings.Please note I was provided a discounted/sample unit for review purposes and my review reflects only my experience with the product.'
title: 'Nice LED Lamps that changes its colors!'

content: 'bI'd love to give the lamp 4.5 stars. It's not quite perfect for what I wanted, but it so close.bHere's what I like/love:b- the swivel head! No issues getting this into a position where it's lighting up what I want.- all the different color temperature settings!'- the different brightness settings!'- the looks! I think it looks great!'- the usb charging port!'b- the weight ... it's quite light, but still just heavy enough.- the swivel base. I don\'t think they advertise it, but whole light arm can swivel a little bit right at the base. Nice touch!'- the touch controls!'bHere's what could be better:- the power button should be one end of the touch panel, and it should have a little tactical bump or something on it so that you can feel it\'s the power button. As it\'s positioned right now, the power button is the 2nd button in from the left. As it\'s the button you\'re going to use the most, it should be on one end or the other making it easier to find and not accidentally hit another button.'b- when you turn on the lamp, it always goes back to max brightness. That can be really hard on the eyes if you're in a dark room. Be nice if it came back on at the brightness you last left it at.b- the usb charger needs more power. Yup, it's a 1 Amp. Yup, it'll charge a tablet (I have an iPad mini and it'll charge it). But at 1 Amp, that charging could take a long time (it won't charge nearly as fast as the stock 1 Amp charger you get with an iPad mini). I higher powered usb charger would be the icing on the cake.bOverall, I'm very happy with this lamp. The light you get from it is bright, even, and flicker-free. The ability to change the color temperature is awesome. The touch controls are very cool! And it just looks plain old awesome. I'm happy enough that I've bought 2 ... one for me and one for my wife. We use them on our bed-side tables for reading in bed.
